42011027	And it happened , while He spoke these things , that a certain woman from the crowd raised [ her ] voice and said to Him , " Blessed is the womb which bore You , and the breasts which nursed You ! "
42011028	But He said , " More than that , blessed are those who hear the word of God and keep it ! "
42011029	Now as the crowds gathered even more , He began to say , " This generation is evil . It seeks a sign , and no sign will be given to it except the sign of Jonah the prophet .
42011030	For just as Jonah became a sign to the Ninevites , so also the Son of Man will be to this generation .
42011031	The queen of the South shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation and shall condemn them , because she came from the ends of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and indeed [ one ] greater than Solomon is here .
42011032	The men of Nineveh shall stand up in the judgment with this generation and shall condemn it , because they repented at the preaching of Jonah ; and indeed [ one ] greater than Jonah is here .
42011033	" No one , having lit a lamp , puts it in a secret place or under a basket , but on a lampstand , so that those who come in may see the light .
42011034	The lamp of the body is the eye . Therefore , when your eye is clear , your whole body also is full of light . But when your eye is evil , your body also is dark .
42011035	Therefore take heed that the light which is in you is not darkness .
42011036	Therefore if your whole body is full of light , not having any part dark , the whole body will be full of light , as when the bright shining of a lamp gives light to you . "
42011037	And as He spoke , a certain Pharisee asked that He would eat with him . And having entered , He reclined [ to eat ] .
42011038	And when the Pharisee saw it , he marveled that He had not first washed before the meal .
42011039	But the Lord said to him , " Now you Pharisees clean the outside of the cup and of the dish , but the inside of you is full of greed and evil .
42011040	Fools ! Did not He who made the outside also make the inside ?
42011041	Nevertheless give what is inside as alms ; and see , all things are clean to you .
42011042	But woe to you Pharisees ! Because you pay a tithe of mint and rue and every vegetable , and you pass over justice and the love of God . These things [ ] you ought to have done , without leaving the others [ undone ] .
42011043	Woe to you Pharisees ! Because you love the first seat in the synagogues and greetings in the marketplaces .
42011044	Woe to you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! Because you are like unmarked graves , and the men walking over them do not know it . "
42011045	Then one of the lawyers answered and said to Him , " Teacher , by saying these things You insult us also . "
42011046	And He said , " Woe to you lawyers as well ! Because you load men with burdens hard to bear , and you yourselves do not touch the burdens with one of your fingers .
42011047	Woe to you ! Because you build the tombs of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
42011048	Consequently , you bear witness to and approve of the deeds of your fathers ; because they indeed killed them , but you build their tombs .
42011049	Therefore the wisdom of God also said , ' I will send to them prophets and apostles , and [ some ] of them they will kill and persecute , '
42011050	so that the blood of all the prophets which was shed from the foundation of the world may be required from this generation ,
42011051	from the blood of Abel to the blood of Zechariah who perished between the altar and the temple . Yes , I say to you , it shall be required of this generation .
42011052	Woe to you lawyers ! Because you have taken away the key of knowledge . You yourselves did not enter in , and those who were entering in you hindered . "
42011053	And as He said these things to them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to be dreadfully hostile , and to cross-examine Him about many things ,
42011054	lying in wait for Him , and seeking to catch Him in something He might say , so that they might accuse Him .
42012001	Now in the meantime , as an innumerable crowd had gathered together so that they were stepping on one another , He began to say to His disciples first of all , " Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
42012002	For there is nothing covered that shall not be unveiled , and [ nothing ] secret that shall not be made known .
42012003	Therefore whatever you have spoken in the dark shall be heard in the light , and what you have spoken in the ear in behind closed doors shall be proclaimed on the housetops .
42012004	" And I say to you , My friends , do not be afraid of those who kill the body , and after that have nothing further they can do .
42012005	But I will show you whom you should fear : fear Him who after He kills , has authority to cast into hell ; yes , I say to you , fear Him !
42012006	Are not five sparrows sold for two copper coins ? And not one of them is forgotten before God .
42012007	But the very hairs of your head have all been numbered . Do not fear therefore ; you are of more value than many sparrows .
42012008	" Also I say to you , whoever confesses Me before men , him the Son of Man also will confess before the angels of God .
42012009	But he who denies Me before men will be denied before the angels of God .
42012010	And anyone who speaks a word against the Son of Man , it will be forgiven him ; but to him who blasphemes against the Holy Spirit , it will not be forgiven .
42012011	Now whenever they bring you to the synagogues and rulers and authorities , do not worry about how or what you should answer , or what you should say .
42012012	For the Holy Spirit will teach you in that very hour what you must say . "
42012013	Then someone from the crowd said to Him , " Teacher , tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me . "
42012014	But He said to him , " Man , who appointed Me a judge or an arbitrator over you ? "
42012015	And He said to them , " Take heed and beware of covetousness , for one's life does not consist in the abundance of his possessions . "
42012016	Then He told a parable to them , saying : " The field of a certain rich man produced well .
42012017	And he reasoned within himself , saying , ' What shall I do , because I have nowhere to gather my crops ? '
42012018	So he said , ' I will do this : I will tear down my barns and I will build bigger [ ones ] , and there I will gather all my crops and my goods .
42012019	And I will say to my soul , " Soul , you have many goods laid away for many years ; relax ; eat , drink , and be merry . " '

42012022	Then He said to His disciples , " Therefore I say to you , do not worry about your life , what you will eat ; nor about the body , what you will wear .
42012023	Life is more than food , and the body is [ more ] than clothing .
42012024	Consider the ravens , for they neither sow nor reap , which have neither storeroom nor barn ; and God feeds them . How much more are you worth than birds ?
42012025	And which of you [ by ] worrying can add one cubit to his stature ?
42012026	Therefore if you cannot do a very little thing , why do you worry about the rest ?

42012028	But if God so clothes the grass , although it is in the field today , and tomorrow is cast into the oven , by how much rather [ will He clothe ] you , O you of little faith ?
42012029	And do not seek what you may eat or what you may drink , and do not be anxious .
42012030	For all these things the nations of the world seek after , but your Father knows that you need these things .
42012031	But seek the kingdom of God , and all these things shall be added to you .
42012032	Do not fear , little flock , because your Father is well pleased to give to you the kingdom .
42012033	Sell your possessions and give alms ; make for yourselves money bags which do not grow old , an unfailing treasure in the heavens , where a thief does not come near , nor does a moth destroy .
42012034	For where your treasure is , there your heart will be also .
42012035	" Let your waist be girded and your lamps burning ;
42012036	and you yourselves be like men who wait for their master , when he will return from the wedding celebration , so that when he comes and knocks , immediately they may open to him .
42012037	Blessed are those servants whom the master , when he comes , will find watching . Assuredly I say to you , that he will gird himself and have them recline [ to eat ] , and he will come and serve them .
42012038	And if he comes in the second watch , or comes in the third watch , and find [ them ] so , blessed are those servants .
42012039	But know this , that if the master of the house had known in what hour the thief was coming , he would have kept watch , and not allowed his house to be broken into .
42012040	Therefore you also be ready , for in an hour that you think not , the Son of Man comes . "
42012041	Then Peter said to Him , " Lord , do You speak this parable only to us , or to all [ people ] ? "
42012042	And the Lord said , " Who then is a faithful and wise steward , whom his master will make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of food in due season ?
42012043	Blessed is that servant whom his master will find so doing when he comes .
42012044	Truly I say to you , that he will appoint him over all his possessions .
42012045	But if that servant says in his heart , ' My master is delaying his coming , ' and begins to beat the male and female servants , and to eat and drink and be drunk ,
42012046	the master of that servant will come on a day which he does not expect , and at an hour which he does not know , and he will cut him in two and appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
42012047	And that servant who knew his master's will , and did not get ready or do according to his will , shall be beaten [ with ] many [ blows ] .
42012048	But he who did not know , yet did things worthy of [ blows ] , shall be beaten [ with ] few . For everyone to whom much is given , from him much will be demanded ; and to whom much has been entrusted , of him they will ask much more .
42012049	" I came to cast fire to the earth , and how I wish it were already kindled !

42012051	Do you think that I came to give peace on earth ? I tell you , not at all , but rather division .

42012053	Father will be divided against a son and a son against father , a mother against a daughter and a daughter against a mother , a mother-in-law against her daughter-in-law and daughter-in-law against her mother-in-law . "
42012054	Then He also said to the crowds , " Whenever you see a cloud rising from the west , immediately you say , ' A rainstorm is coming ' ; and it happens thus .
42012055	And whenever you see the south wind blow , you say , ' There will be hot weather ' ; and it happens .

42012057	" And why do you not judge what is right , even of yourselves ?

42012059	I tell you , you shall by no means depart from there till you have paid the very last mite . "

42014030	saying , ' This man began to build and was not able to finish . '

42015001	Now all the tax collectors and the sinners were drawing near to Him to hear Him .

42016001	He also said to His disciples : " There was a certain rich man who had a manager , and this [ man ] was accused to him as wasting his possessions .

42016003	" Then the manager said within himself , ' What shall I do ? For my master is taking the management away from me . I cannot dig ; I am ashamed to beg .
42016004	I know what I will do , so that whenever I am removed from the management , they will receive me into their houses . '

42016019	" Now there was a certain rich man who was clothed in purple and fine linen , enjoying himself splendidly every day .

42017001	Then He said to the disciples , " It is impossible for offenses not to come , but woe [ to the one ] through whom they do come !
42017002	It would be better for him if a millstone were around his neck , and he be cast into the sea , than that he should offend one of these little ones .
42017003	Take heed to yourselves . If your brother sins against you , rebuke him ; and if he repents , forgive him .
42017004	And if he sins against you seven times in a day , and seven times in a day he returns , saying , ' I repent , ' you shall forgive him . "
42017005	And the apostles said to the Lord , " Increase our faith . "
42017006	So the Lord said , " If you have faith as a mustard seed , you can say to this mulberry tree , ' Be uprooted and be planted in the sea , ' and it would obey you .
42017007	And which of you , having a servant plowing or tending sheep , will say to him when he has come in from the field , ' Come and recline [ to eat ] ' ?
42017008	But will he not say to him , ' Prepare something [ that ] I may dine , and gird yourself and serve me until I eat and drink , and afterward you will eat and drink ' ?
42017009	Does he thank that servant because he did the things having been commanded ? I think not .
42017010	So likewise you , whenever you do all the things having been commanded to you , say , ' We are unprofitable servants . We have done what we ought to do . ' "
42017011	And it happened while He was traveling to Jerusalem that He passed through the midst of Samaria and Galilee .

42017021	neither will they say , ' Look here ! ' or ' Look , there [ it is ] ! ' For behold , the kingdom of God is among you . "

42018001	Then He spoke a parable to them , that one must always pray and not lose heart ,
42018002	saying : " A certain judge was in a certain city , who did not fear God nor have regard for men .
42018003	Now there was a widow in that city ; and she kept coming to him , saying , ' Give justice to me against my adversary . '
42018004	And he did not want to for a time ; but afterward he said within himself , ' although I do not fear God , nor have regard for man ,
42018005	yet because this widow bothers me I will give justice to her , lest she wear me out by forever coming to me . ' "

42022036	Then He said to them , " But now , he who has a money bag , let him take it , and likewise also a knapsack ; and he who has no sword shall sell his garment and buy one .
42022037	For I say to you that this which has been written must still be accomplished in Me - the [ saying , ] ' And He was numbered with the transgressors . ' For the things concerning Me have a fulfillment . "
42022038	So they said , " Lord , look , here are two swords . " And He said to them , " It is enough . "

42022042	saying , " Father , if You will , remove this cup from Me - nevertheless not My will , but Yours , be done . "

42022045	And rising up from prayer , coming to the disciples , He found them sleeping from sorrow .
42022046	Then He said to them , " Why do you sleep ? Rise up and pray , lest you enter into temptation . "
42022047	And while He was still speaking , behold , a crowd ; and he who was called Judas , one of the twelve , was going before them and drew near to Jesus to kiss Him .
42022048	But Jesus said to him , " Judas , do you betray the Son of Man with a kiss ? "
42022049	And those around Him , seeing what was about to happen , they said to Him , " Lord , shall we strike with the sword ? "

42022054	And having arrested Him , they led Him and brought Him into the house of the high priest . And Peter was following from a distance .

42023001	Then the whole multitude of them arose and led Him to Pilate .
42023002	And they began to accuse Him , saying , " We found this [ Man ] perverting the nation , and forbidding to pay taxes to Caesar , saying that He Himself is Christ , a King . "
42023003	Then Pilate questioned Him , saying , " Are You the King of the Jews ? " He answered him and said , " You are saying [ what is ] [ so ] . "
42023004	But Pilate said to the chief priests and the crowds , " I find no guilt in this Man . "
42023005	But they insisted , saying , " He stirs up the people , teaching throughout all Judea , beginning from Galilee to here . "
42023006	When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked if the Man were a Galilean .
42023007	And when he found out that He belonged to Herod's jurisdiction , he sent Him to Herod , who was also in Jerusalem in those days .
42023008	Now when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceedingly glad ; for he had desired for a long time to see Him , because he had heard many things about Him , and he was hoping to see some miracle being done by Him .
42023009	Then he questioned Him with many words , but He answered him nothing .
42023010	And the chief priests and scribes stood , vehemently accusing Him .
42023011	Then Herod , with his men of war , having treated Him with contempt , and having mocked Him , arrayed Him in a gorgeous robe , and sent Him back to Pilate .
42023012	That very day Pilate and Herod became friends with each other , for previously they had been at enmity with each other .
42023013	And Pilate , having called together the chief priests , the rulers , and the people ,
42023014	said to them , " You have brought this Man to me , on the charge of misleading the people . And indeed , when I examined Him in your presence , I found no guilt in this Man in the matters which you bring as charges against Him ;
42023015	and neither [ did ] Herod , for I sent you back to him ; and indeed nothing worthy of death has been done by Him .
42023016	Therefore when I have flogged Him , I will release [ Him . ] "
42023017	( for it was necessary for him to release one to them at the feast ) .
42023018	But they all cried out together , saying , " Away with this [ Man ] , and release to us Barabbas " -

42023021	But they cried out , saying , " Crucify , crucify Him ! "

42024053	and they were continually in the temple praising and blessing God . Amen .
43001001	In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
43001002	He was in the beginning with God .
43001003	All things came to be through Him , and without Him nothing came to be which has come to be .
43001004	In Him was life , and the life was the light of men .
43001005	And the light shines in the darkness , and the darkness did not apprehend it .
43001006	There was a man sent from God , whose name [ was ] John .
43001007	This [ man ] came for a testimony , so that he might testify concerning the Light , so that all through him might believe .
43001008	He was not that Light , but [ was sent ] so that he might testify concerning the Light .
43001009	That was the true Light which lightens every man coming into the world .
43001010	He was in the world , and the world came to be through Him , and the world did not know Him .
43001011	He came to His own , and His own did not receive Him .
43001012	But as many as received Him , He gave them the authority to become children of God , to those who believe in His name ;
43001013	who were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
43001014	And the Word became flesh and dwelt among us , and we beheld His glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , full of grace and truth .
43001015	John testified concerning Him and has cried out , saying , " This was He of whom I said , ' He who comes after me , has come to be before me , because He was before me . ' "
43001016	And out of His fullness we have all received , and grace upon grace .
43001017	For the law was given through Moses , but grace and truth came to be through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No one has seen God at any time . The only begotten Son , He who is in the bosom of the Father , He has declared [ Him ] .
43001019	And this is the testimony of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem so that they might ask him , " Who are you ? "
43001020	He confessed , and did not deny , but confessed , " I am not the Messiah . "
43001021	And they asked him , " What then ? Are you Elijah ? " He said , " I am not . " " Are you the Prophet ? " And he answered , " No . "
43001022	Then they said to him , " Who are you , that we may give an answer to those who sent us ? What do you say about yourself ? "
43001023	He said : " I am ' The voice of one crying in the wilderness : " Make straight the way of the LORD , " ' just as Isaiah the prophet said . "
43001024	Now those who had been sent were from the Pharisees .
43001025	And they asked him , saying , " Why then do you baptize if you are not the Christ , nor Elijah , nor the Prophet ? "
43001026	John answered them , saying , " I baptize with water , but there stands One among you whom you do not know .
43001027	He is the [ One ] who comes after me , who has come to be before me , of whom I am not worthy that I should loose the strap of His sandal . "
43001028	These things happened in Bethany , beyond the Jordan , where John was baptizing .
43001029	The next day he saw Jesus coming toward him , and said , " Behold ! The Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world !
43001030	This is the [ One ] about whom I said , ' After me comes a Man who ranks before me , because He was before me . '
43001031	" I did not know Him ; but that He should be made manifest to Israel , therefore I came baptizing with water . "
43001032	And John testified , saying , " I have beheld the Spirit coming down from heaven like a dove , and He remained upon Him .
43001033	I did not know Him , but He who sent me to baptize with water said to me , ' Upon whom you see the Spirit descending and abiding on Him , this is He who baptizes with the Holy Spirit . '
43001034	" And I have seen and have testified that this is the Son of God . "
43001035	Again , the next day , John stood with two of his disciples .
43001036	And looking at Jesus as He [ was ] walking , he said , " Behold the Lamb of God ! "
43001037	The two disciples heard him speaking , and they followed Jesus .
43001038	Then Jesus turned and observed them following , and said to them , " What are you seeking ? " They said to Him , " Rabbi " ( which is translated , Teacher ) , " where are You staying ? "
43001039	He said to them , " Come and see . " They came and saw where He was staying , and they stayed with Him that day . It was about the tenth hour .
43001040	One of the two who heard John speak , and followed Him , was Andrew , Simon Peter's brother .
43001041	He first found his own brother Simon , and said to him , " We have found the Messiah " ( which is translated , the Christ ) .
43001042	And he led him to Jesus . Now when Jesus looked at him , He said , " You are Simon the son of Jonah . You shall be called Cephas " ( which is translated , A Stone ) .
43001043	On the next day He wanted to go to Galilee , and He found Philip and said to him , " Follow Me . "
43001044	Now Philip was from Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
43001045	Philip found Nathanael and said to him , " We have found the [ One ] about whom Moses wrote in the Law , and the Prophets - Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph . "
43001046	And Nathanael said to him , " Can anything good come out of Nazareth ? " Philip said to him , " Come and see . "

43002001	And on the third day there was a wedding in Cana of Galilee , and the mother of Jesus was there .
43002002	Now both Jesus and His disciples were invited to the wedding .

43002007	Jesus said to them , " Fill the water jars with water . " And they filled them up to the top .

43002010	and said to him , " Every man first sets out the good wine , and when they have well drunk , then the inferior . You have kept the good wine until now ! "

43003001	Now there was a man of the Pharisees whose name [ was ] Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews .
43003002	This [ man ] came to Him by night and said to Him , " Rabbi , we know that You have come from God [ as ] a teacher ; for no one can do these signs that You do unless God is with him . "
43003003	Jesus answered and said to him , " Most assuredly , I say to you , unless someone is born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God . "
43003004	Nicodemus said to Him , " How can a man be born , being old ? Can he enter a second time into his mother's womb and be born ? "
43003005	Jesus answered , " Most assuredly , I say to you , unless someone is born of water and of Spirit , he cannot enter the kingdom of God .
43003006	That which is born of the flesh is flesh , and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
43003007	Do not marvel that I said to you , ' You must be born again . '
43003008	" The wind blows where it wills , and you hear its sound , but you do not know from where it comes and where it goes . So is everyone who has been born of the Spirit . "
43003009	Nicodemus answered and said to Him , " How can these things be ? "
43003010	Jesus answered and said to him , " Are you the teacher of Israel , and do not know these things ?
43003011	Most assuredly I say to you , that which We know , We speak , and that which We have seen , We bear witness to , and you do not receive Our witness .
43003012	If I have told you earthly things and you do not believe , how will you believe if I tell you heavenly things ?
43003013	And no one has gone up into heaven except He who came down out of heaven , the Son of Man , who is in heaven .
43003014	And just as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of Man be lifted up ,
43003015	that everyone who believes in Him should not perish but have eternal life .
43003016	For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son , that whoever believes in Him should not perish but have everlasting life .
43003017	For God did not send His Son into the world so that He might condemn the world , but that the world through Him might be saved .
43003018	He who believes in Him is not condemned ; but he who does not believe has been condemned already , because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
43003019	And this is the condemnation , that the light has come into the world , and men loved the darkness more than the light , because their works were evil .
43003020	For everyone that does evil hates the light and does not come to the light , lest his works be exposed .
43003021	But he who does the truth comes to the light , that his works may be revealed , that they have been done in God . "
43003022	After these things Jesus , along with His disciples , came into the land of Judea , and there He was staying with them and He was baptizing .
43003023	Now John also was baptizing in Aenon near Salem , because there was much water there . And they came and were baptized .
43003024	For John was not yet cast into prison .

43003028	You yourselves bear witness that I said , ' I am not the Christ , ' but , ' I have been sent before Him . '
43003029	" He who has the bride is the bridegroom ; but the friend of the bridegroom , who stands and hears him , rejoices greatly because of the voice of the bridegroom . Therefore my joy has been fulfilled .
43003030	He must increase , but I must decrease .
43003031	He who comes from above is above all ; he who is from the earth is earthly and speaks of the earth . He who comes from heaven is above all .
43003032	And what He has seen and heard , that He testifies ; and no one receives His testimony .
43003033	He who receives His testimony has certified that God is true .
43003034	For He whom God has sent speaks the words of God , for God does not give the Spirit by measure .
43003035	The Father loves the Son , and has given all things into His hand .
43003036	He who believes in the Son has eternal life ; and he who does not believe the Son will not see life , but the wrath of God abides on him . "
43004001	Therefore , when the Lord knew that the Pharisees had heard that Jesus was making and was baptizing more disciples than John
43004002	( although Jesus Himself was not baptizing , but His disciples ) ,
43004003	He left Judea and went away into Galilee .
43004004	But He needed to pass through Samaria .
43004005	Therefore He came to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near the piece of land which Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
43004006	Now Jacob's well was there . Therefore Jesus , having become tired from the journey , was sitting thus by the well . It was about the sixth hour .
43004007	A woman of Samaria came to draw water . Jesus said to her , " Give Me a drink . "
43004008	For His disciples had gone away into the city , that they might buy provisions .
43004009	Then the woman of Samaria said to Him , " How is it that You , being a Jew , ask a drink from me , a Samaritan woman ? " For Jews do not associate with Samaritans .
43004010	Jesus answered and said to her , " If you had known the gift of God , and who it is that says to you , ' Give Me a drink , ' you would have asked Him , and He would have given to you living water . "
43004011	The woman said to Him , " Sir , You have nothing to draw with , and the well is deep . Where then do You get that living water ?
43004012	Are You greater than our father Jacob , [ ] who gave us the well , and drank of it himself , as well as his sons and his livestock ? "
43004013	Jesus answered and said to her , " Whoever drinks of this water will thirst again ,
43004014	but whoever drinks of the water which I shall give him will by no means ever thirst again . But the water which I shall give him will become in him a fountain of water springing up into eternal life . "
43004015	The woman said to Him , " Sir , give me this water , that I may not thirst , nor come here to draw . "
43004016	Jesus said to her , " Go , call your husband , and come here . "
43004017	The woman answered and said , " I have no husband . " Jesus said to her , " You have said well , ' I have no husband , '
43004018	" for you have had five husbands , and [ the one ] whom you now have is not your husband ; in this you have said truly . "
43004019	The woman said to Him , " Sir , I perceive that You are a prophet .
43004020	Our fathers worshipped on this mountain , and you [ Jews ] say that in Jerusalem is the place where it is necessary to worship . "
43004021	Jesus said to her , " Woman , believe Me , the hour is coming when you will neither on this mountain , nor in Jerusalem , worship the Father .
43004022	You worship what you do not know ; we [ Jews ] worship what we know , because salvation is of the Jews .
43004023	But the hour is coming , and now is , when the true worshippers will worship the Father in spirit and truth ; for the Father is seeking such to worship Him .
43004024	God [ is ] Spirit , and those who worship Him must worship in spirit and truth . "
43004025	The woman said to Him , " I know that Messiah is coming " ( who is called Christ ) . " When He comes , He will proclaim to us all things . "
43004026	Jesus said to her , " I am [ He , ] the [ One ] speaking to you . "
43004027	And at this point His disciples came , and they marveled that He was speaking with a woman ; however no one said , " What do You seek ? " or , " Why are You speaking with her ? "
43004028	The woman then left her water jar , went her way into the city , and said to the men ,
43004029	Come , see a Man who told me everything I ever did . Could this be the Christ ? "
43004030	They went out of the city and were coming to Him .
43004031	But in the meantime the disciples urged Him , saying , " Rabbi , eat . "
43004032	But He said to them , " I have food to eat of which you do not know . "
43004033	Therefore the disciples were saying to one another , " Has anyone brought Him [ something ] to eat ? "
43004034	Jesus said to them , " My food is to do the will of Him who sent Me , and to finish His work .
43004035	Do you not say , ' There are still four months and the harvest comes ' ? Behold , I say to you , lift up your eyes and see the fields , for they are already white for harvest !
43004036	And he who [ ] reaps receives wages , and gathers fruit unto eternal life , that both he who sows and he who reaps may rejoice together .
43004037	For in this the saying is true : ' One sows and another reaps . '
43004038	" I sent you to reap that for which you have not labored ; others have labored , and you have entered into their labors . "
43004039	And many of the Samaritans of that city believed in Him because of the word of the woman testifying , " He told me everything I ever did . "
43004040	So when the Samaritans had come to Him , they were asking Him to stay with them ; and He stayed there two days .
43004041	And many more believed because of His word .
43004042	Then they were saying to the woman , " No longer because of your speech do we believe , for we ourselves have heard and know that this is truly the Christ , the Savior of the world . "
43004043	Now after the two days He went out from there and went to Galilee .
43004044	For Jesus Himself testified that a prophet has no honor in his own country .
43004045	Therefore when He came into Galilee , the Galileans received Him , having seen all the things which He did in Jerusalem at the feast ; for they also went to the feast .
43004046	Then Jesus came again to Cana of Galilee where He made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman whose son was sick in Capernaum .
43004047	When he heard that Jesus had come out of Judea into Galilee , he went to Him and asked Him that He might come down and heal his son , for he was about to die .
43004048	Then Jesus said to him , " Unless you [ people ] see signs and wonders , you will by no means believe . "
43004049	The nobleman said to Him , " Sir , come down before my child dies ! "
43004050	Jesus said to him , " Go ; your son lives . " And the man believed the word that Jesus spoke to him , and went away .
43004051	And already as he was going , his servants met him and reported , saying , " Your child lives ! "
43004052	Then he inquired from them the hour at which he got better . And they said to him , " Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him . "
43004053	Therefore the father knew that it was at the same hour in which Jesus said to him , " Your son lives . " And he himself believed , and his whole household .
43004054	This again is the second sign Jesus did , after He had come out of Judea into Galilee .
43005001	After these things there was a feast of the Jews , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43005002	Now there is in Jerusalem by the Sheep [ Gate ] a pool , which is called in Hebrew , Bethesda , having five porches .
43005003	In these [ porches ] were lying a great multitude of those who were sick , blind , lame , paralyzed , waiting for the moving of the water .
43005004	For an angel from time to [ ] time descended into the pool and stirred up the water ; therefore the first [ one ] having gone in after the stirring up of the water , became well of whatever disease he was suffering .
43005005	Now there was a certain man there who had an ailment [ for ] thirty-eight years .
43005006	When Jesus saw this [ man ] lying there , and knew that he already had been in [ that condition ] a long time , He said to him , " Do you wish to become well ? "
43005007	The sick man answered Him , " Sir , I do not have a man , so that whenever the water is stirred up , he may put me into the pool ; but while I am coming , another descends before me . "
43005008	Jesus said to him , " Arise , take up your bed and walk . "
43005009	And immediately the man became well , and took up his bed , and began to walk . And that day was the Sabbath .
43005010	Therefore the Jews said to the man who was healed , " It is the Sabbath ; it is not lawful for you to carry your bed . "
43005011	He answered them , " He that made me whole , He said to me , ' Take up your bed and walk . ' "
43005012	Then they asked him , " Who is the Man who said to you , ' Take up your bed and walk ' ? "
43005013	But the one who was healed did not know who it was , for Jesus had turned aside , while a crowd was in that place .
43005014	After these things Jesus found him in the temple , and said to him , " See , you have become well . Sin no more , lest something worse may happen to you . "
43005015	The man went away and reported to the Jews that Jesus was the [ One ] who had made him well .
43005016	And on account of this the Jews began to persecute Jesus , and were seeking to kill Him , because He was doing these things on the Sabbath .
43005017	But Jesus answered them , " My Father has been working until now , and I am working . "
43005018	Because of this the Jews were seeking all the more to kill Him , because not only was He breaking the Sabbath , but also He called God His own Father , making Himself equal with God .
43005019	Then Jesus answered and said to them , " Most assuredly I say to you , the Son can do nothing of Himself , but what He sees the Father doing ; for whatever He does , the Son also does in like manner .
43005020	For the Father loves the Son , and shows to Him all things which He Himself does ; and greater works than these He will show Him , so that you may marvel .
43005021	For as the Father raises up the dead and gives life , thus also the Son gives life to whom He wills .
43005022	For the Father judges no one , but He has given all judgment to the Son ,
43005023	so that all may honor the Son even as they honor the Father . He who does not honor the Son does not honor the Father who sent Him .
43005024	" Most assuredly I say to you , he who hears My word and believes in Him who sent Me has everlasting life , and shall not come into judgment , but has passed from death into life .
43005025	Most assuredly I say to you , that an hour is coming , and now is , when the dead will hear the voice of the Son of God ; and those having heard shall live .
43005026	For just as the Father has life in Himself , so He has granted the Son to have life in Himself ,
43005027	and has given Him authority to execute judgment also , because He is [ the ] Son of Man .
43005028	Do not marvel at this ; for an hour is coming in which all those in the tombs will hear His voice
43005029	and shall come forth - those who have done good , to a resurrection of life , and those who have done evil , to a resurrection of condemnation .
43005030	I can of My own self do nothing . Even as I hear , I judge ; and My judgment is just , because I do not seek My own will but the will of the Father who sent Me .
43005031	" If I testify of Myself , My testimony is not valid .
43005032	There is another who testifies about Me , and I know that the testimony which He testifies concerning Me is true .
43005033	You have sent to John , and he has testified to the truth .
43005034	But I do not receive the testimony from man , but these things I say so that you may be saved .
43005035	He was the burning and shining lamp , and you were willing to rejoice for a while in his light .
43005036	But I have a testimony greater than John's ; for the works which the Father gave to Me , that I should complete them , these very works which I do , testify of Me , that the Father has sent Me .
43005037	And the Father Himself , who sent Me , has testified about Me . You have neither heard His voice at any time , nor seen His form .
43005038	But you do not have His word abiding in you , because [ Him ] whom He sent , Him you do not believe .
43005039	You search the Scriptures , because you think [ that ] in them you have eternal life ; and these are they which testify about Me .
43005040	But you are unwilling to come to Me , so that you may have life .
43005041	I do not receive glory from men .
43005042	But I have known you , that you do not have the love of God in yourselves .
43005043	I have come in My Father's name , and you do not receive Me ; if another comes in his own name , him you will receive .
43005044	How can you believe , who receive glory from one another , and do not seek the glory which is from the only God ?
43005045	Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father ; there is one who accuses you - Moses , in whom you have hoped .
43005046	For if you believed Moses , you would have believed Me ; for he wrote about Me .
43005047	But if you do not believe his writings , how will you believe My words ? "
43006001	After these things Jesus went over the Sea of Galilee , that is , of Tiberias .
43006002	And a large crowd was following Him , because they were seeing His signs which He was doing upon those who were sick .
43006003	And Jesus went up on the mountain , and there He sat down with His disciples .
43006004	Now the Passover , the feast of the Jews , was near .
43006005	Then Jesus lifted up His eyes , and seeing that a large crowd was coming toward Him , He said to Philip , " Where shall we buy bread , that these [ people ] may eat ? "
43006006	But this He said to test him , for He Himself knew what He was about to do .
43006007	Philip answered Him , " Two hundred denarii [ worth of ] bread is not enough for them , that each of them might receive a little . "
43006008	One of His disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter's brother , said to Him ,
43006009	There is a little boy here who has five barley loaves and two small fish , but what are they for so many ? "
43006010	Then Jesus said , " Make the people to recline . " Now there was much grass in that place . Therefore the men reclined , in number about five thousand .
43006011	And Jesus took the loaves , and having given thanks He distributed them to the disciples , and the disciples to those who were reclining ; and likewise of the fish , as much as they wished .
43006012	But when they were filled , He said to His disciples , " Gather up the leftover fragments , so that nothing may be lost . "
43006013	Therefore they gathered [ them ] up , and they filled twelve baskets of fragments from the five barley loaves which were left over by those who had eaten .
43006014	Then those men , when they had seen the sign that Jesus did , said , " This is truly the Prophet who is to come into the world . "

43006016	Now when evening came , His disciples went down to the sea ,
43006017	and having entered into the boat , they were going across the sea to Capernaum . And darkness had already come , and Jesus had not come to them .
43006018	And the sea was agitated by a great blowing wind .
43006019	Therefore having rowed about three or four miles , they saw Jesus walking on the sea and drawing near to the boat ; and they were frightened .
43006020	But He said to them , " [ It is ] I AM ; do not fear . "
43006021	Then they were willing to receive Him into the boat , and immediately the boat arrived at the land to which they were going .
43006022	On the next day , when the crowd which had remained on the other side of the sea , having seen that there was no other boat there , except that one in which His disciples had entered , and that Jesus had not entered into the boat with His disciples , but His disciples had gone away alone -
43006023	however , other boats came from Tiberias , near the place where they ate bread after the Lord had given thanks -
43006024	when the crowd therefore saw that Jesus was not there , nor His disciples , they got into boats and came to Capernaum , seeking Jesus .
43006025	And having found Him on the other side of the sea , they said to Him , " Rabbi , when did You come here ? "
43006026	Jesus answered them and said , " Most assuredly I say to you , you seek Me , not because you saw the signs , but because you ate from the loaves and were satisfied .
43006027	Work not for the food which perishes , but for the food which abides unto everlasting life , which the Son of Man will give to you ; for [ upon ] Him God the Father has set [ His ] seal . "
43006028	Then they said to Him , " What should we do , that we may work the works of God ? "
43006029	Jesus answered and said to them , " This is the work of God , that you believe in Him whom He sent . "
43006030	Therefore they said to Him , " What sign will You do then , so that we may see it and believe You ? What work do You perform ?
43006031	Our fathers ate the manna in the wilderness ; as it is written , ' He gave them bread from heaven to eat . ' "
43006032	Then Jesus said to them , " Most assuredly I say to you , Moses has not given you the bread from heaven , but My Father gives you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	For the bread of God is He who comes down from heaven and gives life to the world . "
43006034	Then they said to Him , " Lord , give us this bread always . "
43006035	And Jesus said to them , " I am the bread of life . He who comes to Me shall never hunger , and he who believes in Me shall never thirst .
43006036	But I told you that you have both seen Me and you do not believe .
43006037	All that the Father gives Me shall come to Me , and the one who comes to Me I will by no means cast out .
43006038	For I have come down from heaven , not that I might do My will , but the will of Him who sent Me .
43006039	And this is the will of the Father who sent Me , that of all He has given Me , I should lose nothing , but should raise it up at the last day .
43006040	And this is the will of Him who sent Me , that everyone who sees the Son and believes in Him may have eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day . "
43006041	Therefore the Jews were murmuring about Him , because He said , " I am the bread which came down from heaven . "
43006042	And they were saying , " Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? How then does this [ Man ] say , ' I have come down from heaven ' ? "
43006043	Jesus therefore answered and said to them , " Do not murmur among yourselves .
43006044	No one can come to Me unless the Father who sent Me should draw him ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
43006045	It is written in the prophets , ' And they shall all be taught of God . ' Therefore everyone who hears from the Father , and has learned , comes to Me .

43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your fathers ate the manna in the wilderness , and died .
43006050	This is the bread which comes down from heaven , that one may eat of it and not die .
43006051	I am the living bread which came down from heaven . If anyone eats of this bread , he will live forever ; and the bread that I shall give is My flesh , which I shall give for the life of the world . "

43006056	He who eats My flesh and drinks My blood abides in Me , and I in him .
43006057	Just as the living Father sent Me , and I live because of the Father , so he who feeds on Me will live because of Me .
43006058	This is the bread which came down from heaven , not as your fathers ate the manna , and died . He that eats this bread shall live forever . "

43006063	It is the Spirit who makes alive ; the flesh profits nothing . The words that I speak to you are spirit , and they are life .
43006064	But there are some of you who do not believe . " For Jesus knew from the beginning who were the ones who did not believe , and who was the one who would betray Him .
43006065	And He said , " Because of this I have said to you that no one can come to Me unless it has been granted to him by My Father . "

43007001	And after these things Jesus was walking in Galilee ; for He did not wish to walk in Judea , because the Jews were seeking to kill Him .
43007002	Now the Jewish Feast of Tabernacles was near .
43007003	His brothers therefore said to Him , " Depart from here and go into Judea , so that Your disciples also may see the works that You do .

43008013	Therefore the Pharisees said to Him , " You testify about Yourself ; Your testimony is not valid . "

43008015	You judge according to the flesh ; I judge no one .
43008016	But even if I do judge , My judgment is true ; because I am not alone , but I am with the Father who sent Me .
43008017	It is also written in your law that the testimony of two men is valid .
43008018	I am the [ One ] testifying about Myself , and the Father who sent Me testifies about Me . "
43008019	Then they said to Him , " Where is Your Father ? " Jesus answered , " You know neither Me nor My Father . If you knew Me , you would also know My Father . "
43008020	These words Jesus spoke in the treasury , while teaching in the temple ; and no one seized Him , for His time had not yet come .
43008021	Then Jesus said to them again , " I am going away , and you will seek Me , and will die in your sin . Where I go you cannot come . "
43008022	So the Jews said , " [ Surely ] He will not kill Himself , [ will He , ] since He says , ' Where I am going you cannot come ' ? "
43008023	And He said to them , " You are from below ; I am from above . You are from this world ; I am not from this world .
43008024	Therefore I said to you that you will die in your sins ; for if you do not believe that I AM , you will die in your sins . "
43008025	Then they said to Him , " Who are You ? " And Jesus said to them , " Just what I have been saying to you [ from ] the beginning .
43008026	I have many things to say and to judge concerning you , but He who sent Me is true ; and the [ ] things which I heard from Him , these things I say to the world . "
43008027	They did not know that He was speaking to them [ about ] the Father .
43008028	Therefore Jesus said to them , " When you lift up the Son of Man , then you will know that I AM , and from Myself I do nothing ; but just as My Father taught Me , these things I speak .
43008029	And He who sent Me is with Me . The Father has not left Me alone , because I always do the things pleasing to Him . "
43008030	While He spoke these words , many believed in Him .
43008031	Then Jesus said to those Jews who had believed Him , " If you abide in My word , truly you are My disciples .
43008032	And you shall know the truth , and the truth shall set you free . "
43008033	They answered Him , " We are Abraham's descendants , and have never been in bondage to anyone . How [ can ] you say , ' You will become free ' ? "
43008034	Jesus answered them , " Most assuredly I say to you , that everyone that practices sin is a slave of sin .
43008035	And a slave does not remain in the house forever , but a son remains forever .
43008036	Therefore if the Son sets you free , you will be truly free .
43008037	" I know that you are Abraham's descendants , but you seek to kill Me , because My word finds no place in you .
43008038	I speak what I have seen with My Father , and you do what you have seen with your father . "
43008039	They answered and said to Him , " Abraham is our father . " Jesus said to them , " If you were Abraham's children , you would do the works of Abraham .
43008040	But now you seek to kill Me , a Man who has spoken to you the truth which I heard from God . Abraham did not do this .
43008041	You do the works of your father . " Then they said to Him , " We were not born of fornication ; we have one Father - God . "
43008042	Therefore Jesus said to them , " If God were your Father , you would have loved Me , for I came forth and have come from God ; nor have I come from Myself , but He sent Me .
43008043	Why do you not understand what I say ? Because you are unable to hear My word .
43008044	You are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father you desire to do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and has not stood in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he tells a lie , he speaks from his own [ resources ] , for he is a liar , and the father of lies .
43008045	But because I tell the truth , you do not believe Me .
43008046	Which of you convicts Me of sin ? And if I tell the truth , why do you not believe Me ?
43008047	He who is of God hears God's words ; therefore you do not hear [ them ] , because you are not of God . "
43008048	Then the Jews answered and said to Him , " Do we not say well that You are a Samaritan , and You have a demon ? "
43008049	Jesus answered , " I do not have a demon ; but I honor My Father , and you dishonor Me .
43008050	And I do not seek My own glory ; there is One who seeks it and who judges .
43008051	Most assuredly I say to you , if anyone keeps My word he shall by no means experience death . "
43008052	Then the Jews said to Him , " Now we know that You have a demon ! Abraham and the prophets died , and You say , ' If anyone keeps My word he shall by no means taste death . '
43008053	" Are You greater than our father Abraham , who died ? Also the prophets died . Whom do You make Yourself [ out to be ] ? "
43008054	Jesus answered , " If I glorify Myself , My glory is nothing . It is My Father who glorifies Me , of whom you say that He is our God .
43008055	And yet you have not known Him , but I know Him . And if I would say that I do not know Him , I would be like you , a liar ; but I do know Him , and I keep His word .
43008056	Your father Abraham rejoiced that he should see My day , and he saw it and he was glad . "
43008057	Then the Jews said to Him , " You are not yet fifty years old , and have You seen Abraham ? "
43008058	Jesus said to them , " Most assuredly I say to you , before Abraham was , I AM . "
43008059	Therefore they picked up stones to throw at Him ; but Jesus hid Himself and went out of the temple , having gone through their midst , and so passed by .
43009001	And passing by , He saw a man blind from birth .
43009002	And His disciples asked Him , saying , " Rabbi , who sinned , this man or his parents , that he was born blind ? "
43009003	Jesus answered , " Neither this [ man ] nor his parents sinned , but so that the works of God should be manifest in him .
43009004	I must work the works of Him who sent Me while it is day ; the night is coming when no one can work .
43009005	While I am in the world , I am the light of the world . "
43009006	Having said these things , He spat on the ground and made clay from the saliva ; and He applied the clay on the eyes of the blind [ man ] .
43009007	And He said to him , " Go , wash in the pool of Siloam " ( which is translated , Sent ) . So he went and washed , and came back seeing .
43009008	Therefore the neighbors and those who previously saw him , that he was blind , were saying , " Is not this he who sat and begged ? "
43009009	Some said , " This is he . " Others said , " He looks like him . " He kept saying , " I am [ he ] . "
43009010	Therefore they said to him , " How were your eyes opened ? "
43009011	He answered and said , " A Man called Jesus made clay and anointed my eyes and said to me , ' Go to the pool of Siloam and wash . ' When I had gone and washed , I received [ my ] sight . "
43009012	Then they said to him , " Where is He ? " He said , " I do not know . "
43009013	They brought him who was once blind to the Pharisees .
43009014	Now it was a Sabbath when Jesus made the clay and opened his eyes .
43009015	Then again the Pharisees were asking him how he received [ his ] sight . And he said to them , " He put clay on my eyes , and I washed , and I see . "
43009016	Therefore some of the Pharisees were saying , " This Man is not from God , because He does not keep the Sabbath . " Others said , " How can a sinful man do such signs ? " And there was a division among them .
43009017	They said to the blind [ man ] again , " What do you say about Him because He opened your eyes ? " He said , " He is a prophet . "
43009018	But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he was blind and received [ his ] sight , until they called the parents of him who had received [ his ] sight .
43009019	And they asked them , saying , " Is this your son , who you say was born blind ? How then does he now see ? "
43009020	And his parents answered them and said , " We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind ;
43009021	but how he now sees we do not know , or who opened his eyes we do not know . He is of age ; ask him . He will speak for himself . "
43009022	These things [ ] his parents said because they feared the Jews , for the Jews had agreed already that if anyone should confess that He was Christ , he would be excommunicated .
43009023	On account of this his parents said , " He is of age ; ask him . "
43009024	Therefore they called a second time the man who was blind , and said to him , " Give glory to God ! We know that this Man is a sinner . "
43009025	He answered and said , " Whether He is a sinner or not I do not know . One [ thing ] I do know : that although I was blind , now I see . "
43009026	Then they said to him again , " What did He do to you ? How did He open your eyes ? "
43009027	He answered them , " I told you already , and you did not listen . Why do you wish to hear [ it ] again ? Do you also want to become His disciples ? "
43009028	[ Then ] they reviled him and said , " You are His disciple , but we are disciples of Moses .
43009029	We know that God has spoken to Moses ; but [ as for ] this [ Man ] , we do not know where He is from . "
43009030	The man answered and said to them , " Why , this is a remarkable thing , that you do not know where He is from ; yet He opened my eyes !
43009031	Now we know that God does not hear sinners ; but if anyone is God-fearing and does His will , He hears him .
43009032	Since eternity past it was unheard of that anyone opened the eyes of [ one ] having been born blind .
43009033	If this [ Man ] were not from God , He could do nothing . "
43009034	They answered and said to him , " You were completely born in sins , and do you teach us ? " And they cast him out .
43009035	Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and having found him , He said to him , " Do you believe in the Son of God ? "
43009036	He answered and said , " And who is He , Lord , that I may believe in Him ? "
43009037	And Jesus said to him , " You have both seen Him and it is He who is speaking with you . "
43009038	Then he said , " Lord , I believe ! " And he worshipped Him .
43009039	And Jesus said , " For judgment I came into this world , that those who do not see may see , and those who see might become blind . "
43009040	Then [ some ] of the Pharisees who were with Him heard these things , and said to Him , " Are we blind also ? "
43009041	Jesus said to them , " If you were blind , you would have no sin ; but now you say , ' We see . ' Therefore your sin remains .
43010001	" Most assuredly I say to you , he who does not enter the sheepfold through the door , but climbs up some other way , he is a thief and a robber .
43010002	But he who enters through the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
43010003	To him the doorkeeper opens , and the sheep hear his voice ; and he calls his own sheep by name and he leads them out .
43010004	And whenever he brings out his own sheep , he goes before them ; and the sheep follow him , because they know his voice .
43010005	But they will by no means follow a stranger , but they will flee from him , for they do not know the voice of strangers . "
43010006	This illustration Jesus spoke to them , but they did not understand the things which He spoke to them .
43010007	Then Jesus said to them again , " Most assuredly I say to you , I am the door of the sheep .
43010008	All who came [ before Me ] are thieves and robbers , but the sheep did not hear them .
43010009	I am the door . If anyone enters by Me , he will be saved , and will go in and go out , and will find pasture .
43010010	The thief does not come except to steal , and to kill , and to destroy . I have come that they may have life , and that they may have it more abundantly .
43010011	I am the good shepherd . The good shepherd lays down His life for the sheep .
43010012	But a hired hand , he who is not the shepherd , one who does not own the sheep , sees the wolf coming and leaves the sheep and flees ; and the wolf catches the sheep and scatters them .
43010013	But the hired hand flees because he is a hired hand , and is not concerned about the sheep .
43010014	I am the good shepherd ; and I know My [ own ] , and I am known by My own .
43010015	Just as the Father knows Me , I also know the Father ; and I lay down My life for the sheep .
43010016	And other sheep I have which are not of this fold ; those also I must bring , and they will hear My voice ; and there shall be one flock and one shepherd .
43010017	Therefore My Father loves Me , because I lay down My life that I may take it [ up ] again .
43010018	No one takes it from Me , but I lay it down of Myself . I have authority to lay it down , and I have authority to take it [ up ] again . This command I have received from My Father . "
43010019	Therefore there was a division again among the Jews because of these words .
43010020	And many of them said , " He has a demon and is raving mad . Why do you listen to Him ? "
43010021	Others said , " These are not the words of [ one ] being demon-possessed . Can a demon open the eyes of the blind ? "
43010022	Now it was the Feast of Dedication in Jerusalem , and it was winter .
43010023	And Jesus was walking in the temple , in Solomon's Porch .
43010024	Then the Jews encircled Him and said to Him , " How long will You hold us in suspense ? If You are the Christ , tell us plainly . "
43010025	Jesus answered them , " I told you , and you do not believe . The works that I do in My Father's name , these things testify about Me .
43010026	But you do not believe , because you are not of My sheep , just as I said to you .
43010027	My sheep hear My voice , and I know them , and they follow Me .
43010028	And I give to them eternal life , and they shall never perish ; and no one will snatch them out of My hand .
43010029	My Father , who has given [ them ] to Me , is greater than all ; and no one is able to snatch [ them ] out of My Father's hand .
43010030	I and the Father are one . "
43010031	Therefore the Jews took up stones again to stone Him .

43010033	The Jews answered Him , saying , " For a good work we do not stone You , but for blasphemy , and because You , being a Man , make Yourself God . "
43010034	Jesus answered them , " Is it not written in your law , ' I said , " You are gods " ' ?
43010035	If He called those gods , to whom the word of God came ( and the Scripture cannot be broken ) ,
43010036	do you say of Him whom the Father sanctified and sent into the world , ' You are blaspheming , ' because I said , ' I am the Son of God ' ?
43010037	If I am not doing the works of My Father , do not believe Me ;
43010038	but if I am doing [ them ] , even if you do not believe Me , believe the works , so that you may know and believe that the Father is in Me , and I in Him . "

43010041	And many came to Him and said , " John indeed performed no sign , but everything which John said about this [ Man ] was true . "
43010042	And many believed in Him there .
43011001	Now there was a certain man who was sick , Lazarus from Bethany , of the village of Mary and her sister Martha .
43011002	Now it was that Mary who had anointed the Lord with myrrh , and wiped His feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick .
43011003	Therefore the sisters sent to Him , saying , " Lord , behold , [ he ] whom You love is sick . "
43011004	And when Jesus heard , He said , " This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God may be glorified through it . "
43011005	Now Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus .
43011006	Therefore when He heard that he was sick , He then stayed in the place where He was [ for ] two days .

43011008	The disciples said to Him , " Rabbi , [ just ] now the Jews were seeking to stone You , and are You going there again ? "

43011010	But if anyone walks in the night , he stumbles , because the light is not in him . "
43011011	These things He said , and after this He said to them , " Our friend Lazarus has fallen asleep , but I am going so that I may awaken him . "
43011012	Then His disciples said , " Lord , if he has fallen asleep he will get well . "

43011017	Therefore when He had come , Jesus found that he had already been in the tomb four days .

43011022	But even now I know that whatever You may ask of God , God will give You . "

43011031	Then the Jews who were with her in the house and consoling her , when they saw that Mary rose up quickly and went out , followed her , saying , " She is going to the tomb , so that she may weep there . "

43011033	Therefore , when Jesus saw her weeping , and the Jews who had come along with her weeping , He groaned in the spirit and was troubled .

43011036	Therefore the Jews were saying , " Look how He loved him ! "

43011039	Jesus said , " Take away the stone . " Martha , the sister of the [ one ] having died , said to Him , " Lord , already there is a stench , for he has been dead four days . "
43011040	Jesus said to her , " Did I not say to you that if you would believe you would see the glory of God ? "

43011042	And I knew that You always hear Me , but because of the people standing around I said [ this ] , so that they may believe that You sent Me . "
43011043	And having said these things , He cried out with a loud voice , " Lazarus , come forth ! "

43011046	But some of them went away to the Pharisees , and told them the things which Jesus had done .
43011047	Therefore the chief priests and the Pharisees gathered a council and said , " What are we doing ? For this Man works many signs .
43011048	If we leave Him alone in this way , all will believe in Him , and the Romans will come and will take away both our place and nation . "
43011049	But a certain one of them , Caiaphas , being high priest that year , said to them , " You don't know anything ,
43011050	nor do you consider that it is advantageous for us that one man should die for the people , and not that the whole nation should perish . "
43011051	Now this he did not say on his own , but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus was about to die for the nation ,
43011052	and not for that nation only , but also that He would gather together in one the children of God who were scattered abroad .

43012001	Then Jesus , six days before the Passover , came to Bethany , where Lazarus was who had died , whom He raised from the dead .

43012006	This he said , not because he cared for the poor , but because he was a thief , and had the money box ; and he used to pilfer the things which were placed in it .

43012011	because on account of him many of the Jews were going [ away ] , and were believing in Jesus .

43012013	took the branches of the palm trees and went out to meet Him , and they were crying out , " Hosanna ! ' Blessed is He who comes in the name of the LORD ! ' The King of Israel ! "
43012014	Then Jesus , when He had found a young donkey , he sat on it ; as it is written :

43012019	The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , " You see that you are not doing any good . Look , the world has gone after Him ! "
43012020	And there were some Greeks among those coming up , so that they might worship at the feast .
43012021	Then they approached Philip , who was from Bethsaida of Galilee , and they asked him , saying , " Sir , we wish to see Jesus . "
43012022	Philip came and told Andrew , and in turn Andrew and Philip told Jesus .
43012023	But Jesus answered them , saying , " The hour has come that the Son of Man should be glorified .
43012024	Most assuredly I say to you , unless a grain of wheat falls into the ground and dies , it remains alone ; but if it dies , it bears much fruit .
43012025	He that loves his life shall lose it , and he that hates his life in this world shall keep it for eternal life .

43012029	Therefore the crowd which was standing and heard were saying that it had thundered . Others were saying , " An angel has spoken to Him . "
43012030	Jesus answered and said , " This voice did not come for My sake , but for your sake .

43012034	The crowd answered Him , " We heard from the law that the Christ abides forever ; and so how do You say , ' The Son of Man must be lifted up ' ? Who is this Son of Man ? "
43012035	Then Jesus said to them , " [ For ] yet a little while longer the light is with you . Walk while you have the light , lest darkness overtake you ; he who walks in darkness does not know where he is going .
43012036	While you have the light , believe in the light , so that you may become sons of light . " These things Jesus spoke , and departing , He was hidden from them .
43012037	But even though He had done so many signs in their presence , they did not believe in Him ,
43012038	that the word of Isaiah the prophet might be fulfilled , which he said : " Lord , who has believed our report ? And to whom has the arm of the LORD been revealed ? "
43012039	Therefore they could not believe , because Isaiah said again :
43012040	" He has blinded their eyes and hardened their hearts , lest they should see with their eyes , lest they should understand with their hearts and turn , and I would heal them . "
43012041	These things Isaiah said when he saw His glory and spoke about Him .
43012042	Nevertheless even from among the rulers many believed in Him , but because of the Pharisees they did not confess Him , lest they should be excommunicated ;
43012043	for they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
43012044	Then Jesus cried out and said , " He who believes in Me , believes not in Me but in Him who sent Me .
43012045	And he who sees Me sees Him who sent Me .
43012046	I have come as a light into the world , so that whoever believes in Me may not abide in darkness .
43012047	And if anyone hears My words and does not believe , I do not judge him ; for I did not come that I might judge the world , but that I might save the world .
43012048	He that rejects Me , and does not receive My words , has that which judges him - the word which I spoke , that [ word ] will judge him in the last day .
43012049	For I have not spoken on My own [ authority ] ; but the Father who sent Me gave Me a command , what I should say and what I should speak .
43012050	And I know that His command is eternal life . Therefore , whatever I speak , as the Father has said to Me , thus I speak . "
43013001	Now before the feast of the Passover , when Jesus knew that His hour had come that He should depart from this world to the Father , having loved His own who were in the world , He loved them to the end .
43013002	And after supper , the devil having already put it into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon's son , to betray Him ,
43013003	Jesus , knowing that the Father had given all things into His hands , and that He had come from God and was going to God ,
43013004	He rose from the supper and laid aside His garments , and having taken a towel , He girded Himself .
43013005	Then He poured water into a basin and began to wash the feet of the disciples , and to dry [ them ] with the towel with which He was girded .
43013006	Then He came to Simon Peter . And Peter said to Him , " Lord , do You wash my feet ? "
43013007	Jesus answered and said to him , " What I am doing you do not understand now , but you shall know after this . "
43013008	Peter said to Him , " You shall never wash my feet ! " Jesus answered him , " Unless I wash you , you have no part with Me . "

43019034	But one of the soldiers pierced His side with a spear , and immediately blood and water came out .
