58008011	And by no means will they teach each [ one ] his fellow citizen , and each [ one ] his brother , saying , ' Know the LORD , ' for all shall know Me , from the least of them to the greatest of them .
58008012	For I will be merciful to their iniquities , and their sins and their lawless deeds I shall by no means remember anymore . "
58008013	In that He says , " A new [ covenant ] , " He has made the first obsolete . And whatever is becoming obsolete and growing old is ready to vanish .
58009001	Now even the first [ covenant ] had ordinances of [ divine ] service and the earthly sanctuary .
58009002	For a tabernacle was prepared : the first [ part ] , in which [ were ] both the lampstand and the table and the showbread , which is called the holy place ;
58009003	and after the second veil , the part of the tabernacle which is called the Holy of Holies ,
58009004	having a golden altar , and the ark of the covenant having been overlaid on all sides with gold , in which [ was ] a golden jar holding the manna , and the rod of Aaron which budded , and the tablets of the covenant ;
58009005	and above it [ were ] cherubim of glory overshadowing the mercy seat ; concerning these things we cannot now speak in detail .
58009006	Now when these things had been thus prepared , the priests always went into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the services ,
58009007	but into the second [ part ] the high priest [ goes ] alone once during the year , not without blood , which he offers for himself and for the people's sins committed in ignorance ;
58009008	the Holy Spirit signifying this , that the way into the Holiest of All was not yet revealed while the first tabernacle was still standing ,
58009009	which [ was ] symbolic for the present time , according to which both gifts and sacrifices are being offered , which are not able , in respect to conscience , to make perfect the [ one ] performing the service ,
58009010	[ concerned ] only with foods and drinks , various washings , and fleshly ordinances which are imposed until a time of reformation .
58009011	But Christ came [ as ] a High Priest of the good things to come , through the greater and more perfect tabernacle not made with hands , that is , not of this creation .
58009012	Not through the blood of goats and calves , but through His own blood , He entered once for all into the Holies , having obtained eternal redemption .
58009013	For if the blood of bulls and goats and the ashes of a heifer , sprinkling those having been defiled , sanctifies for the purity of the flesh ,
58009014	by how much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered Himself without spot to God , will cleanse your conscience from dead works in order that we might serve the living God ?
58009015	And on account of this He is the Mediator of the new covenant , so that , since a death has occurred for redemption of the transgressions at the time of the first covenant , that those having been called may receive the promise of the eternal inheritance .
58009016	For where there [ is ] a testament , there is necessity for death to be offered of the [ one ] making the testament .
58009017	For a testament is valid over dead [ people ] , since it is never valid when the [ one ] making the testament lives .
58009018	Therefore not even the first [ covenant ] has been dedicated without blood .
58009019	For when every commandment had been spoken by Moses according to law to all the people , he took the blood of calves and goats , with water , scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book itself and all the people ,
58009020	saying , " This is the blood of the covenant which God has commanded you . "
58009021	And likewise he sprinkled both the tabernacle and all the vessels of the service with the blood .
58009022	And according to the law almost all things are purified with blood , and without shedding of blood there is no remission .
58009023	Therefore it [ was ] necessary that the copies of the things in the heavens to be continually purified with these , but the heavenly things themselves by better sacrifices than these .
58009024	For Christ did not enter into [ the ] holies made by hands , which are copies of the true , but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God on our behalf ;
58009025	not that He should offer Himself often , as the high priest enters into the Holies every year with another's blood -
58009026	since it would have been necessary [ for ] Him to suffer often from the foundation of the world ; but now , once at the consummation of the ages , He has appeared to put away sin through the sacrifice of Himself .
58009027	And inasmuch as it is appointed for men once to die and after this judgment ,
58009028	so also Christ , having been offered once to bear the sins of many , will appear a second time apart from sin unto salvation , to those who eagerly await Him .
58010001	For the law , having a shadow of the good things to come , and not the image itself of the things , can never with the same sacrifices , which they offer continually every year , make those approaching perfect .
58010002	Otherwise they would not have ceased to be offered , because the worshippers , once purified , would have had no more consciousness of sins .
58010003	But in them there is a reminder of sins every year .
58010004	For it is not possible for [ the ] blood of bulls and goats to take away sins .
58010005	Therefore , when He entered into the world , He said : " Sacrifice and offering You did not desire , but a body You have prepared for Me .
58010006	In burnt offerings and [ sacrifices ] for sin You had no pleasure .
58010007	Then I said , ' Behold , I have come - In the volume of the book it is written of Me- To do Your will , O God . ' "
58010008	Earlier saying , " Sacrifice and offering , burnt offerings , and [ sacrifices ] for sin You did not desire , nor had pleasure in them " ( which are offered according to the law ) ,
58010009	then He has said , " Behold , I have come to do Your will , O God . " He takes away the first in order that He may establish the second .
58010010	By which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
58010011	And every priest stands ministering daily and offering repeatedly the same sacrifices , which are never able to take away sins .
58010012	But He Himself , having offered one sacrifice for sins forever , He sat down at the right hand of God ,
58010013	from that time waiting till His enemies are placed as a footstool for His feet .
58010014	For by one offering He has perfected forever those who are being sanctified .
58010015	But the Holy Spirit also witnesses to us ; for after He had said before ,
58010016	" This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , says the LORD : I will put My laws on their hearts , and I will inscribe them on their minds ,
58010017	and their sins and their lawless deeds I shall by no means remember any longer . "
58010018	Now where there is remission of these , there is no longer an offering for sin .
58010019	Therefore , brothers , having boldness to enter the Holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
58010020	by a new and living way which He inaugurated for us , through the veil , that is , His flesh ,
58010021	and [ having ] a High Priest over the house of God ,
58010022	let us approach with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies having been washed with clean water .
58010023	Let us hold fast the confession of our hope without wavering , for He who promised is faithful .
58010024	And let us consider one another for the stirring up of love and of good works ,
58010025	not forsaking the assembling of ourselves , just as is the custom for some , but exhorting [ one another ] , and all the more as you see the Day drawing near .
58010026	For if we sin willfully after receiving the knowledge of the truth , there no longer remains a sacrifice for sins ,
58010027	but a certain fearful expectation of judgment , and fiery zeal being about to devour the adversaries .
58010028	Anyone disregarding the law of Moses dies without compassions on [ the testimony of ] two or three witnesses .
58010029	By how much worse punishment , do you think , will he be deemed worthy who has trampled the Son of God underfoot , and has regarded as common the blood of the covenant , by which he was sanctified , and has insulted the Spirit of grace ?
58010030	For we know Him who said , " Vengeance is Mine ; I will repay , " says the Lord . And again , " The LORD will judge His people . "
58010031	It is a fearful [ thing ] to fall into the hands of the living God !
58010032	But remember the former days , in which after you were enlightened , you endured a great struggle of sufferings ,
58010033	in part being exposed publicly , both to reproaches and to afflictions , and in part having become partners of those treated in this way .
58010034	For you sympathized with me in my chains , and you received the plunder of your possessions with joy , knowing that you have for yourselves a better and enduring possession in heaven .
58010035	Therefore do not cast away your confidence , which has a great recompense .
58010036	For you have need of endurance , so that having done the will of God , you may receive the promise :
58010037	" For yet a little while , and He who is coming will come and will not delay .
58010038	But the just shall live by faith , and if he withdraws , My soul has no pleasure in him . "
58010039	But we are not of [ those ] shrinking back to destruction , but of faith , to the saving of the soul .
58011001	Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
58011002	For by it the elders obtained witness .
58011003	By faith we understand that time [ itself ] was framed by a command of God , so that the things which are seen were not made of things which are visible .
58011004	By faith Abel offered to God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , through which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying concerning his gifts ; and through it , although he died , he still speaks .
58011005	By faith Enoch was translated [ so as ] not to see death , " and he was not found , because God translated him " ; for before his translation he had obtained witness that he was pleasing to God .
58011006	But without faith it is impossible to please [ God ] , for it is necessary [ for ] the [ one ] approaching God to believe that He is , and that He becomes a rewarder of those who diligently seek Him .
58011007	By faith Noah , having being warned [ by God ] concerning the things [ ] not yet seen , being reverent , prepared an ark for the salvation of his household , through which he condemned the world and became an heir of the righteousness which is according to faith .
58011008	By faith Abraham obeyed when he was called to go forth to the place which he was about to receive as an inheritance . And he went out , not knowing where he was going .
58011009	By faith he migrated into a land of promise as [ in ] a foreign [ land ] , dwelling in tents with Isaac and Jacob , the fellow heirs of the same promise ;
58011010	for he waited for the city having foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
58011011	By faith Sarah herself also received power for conception of seed , and she bore a child past the normal age , because she regarded [ Him ] faithful who had promised .
58011012	Therefore even from one [ man ] they were begotten , and him as good as dead , just as the stars of the sky in multitude , and innumerable as the sand by the seashore .
58011013	These all died according to faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off and welcoming [ them ] , and confessing that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
58011014	For those saying such things make evident that they seek a fatherland .
58011015	And indeed if they had remembered that land from which they went out , they would have had opportunity to turn back .
58011016	But now they desire a better [ land ] , that is , a heavenly [ one ] . Therefore God is not ashamed to be called their God , for He has prepared a city for them .
58011017	By faith Abraham , when he was tested , had offered up Isaac , and he that received the promises offered up his only begotten [ son ] ,
58011018	of whom it was spoken , " In Isaac your seed shall be called , "
58011019	considering that even from the dead , God [ was ] able to raise [ him up ] , from which he also received him in a figurative sense .
58011020	By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
58011021	By faith Jacob , when he was dying , blessed each of the sons of Joseph , and worshipped , [ leaning ] on the top of his staff .
58011022	By faith Joseph , when he was dying , remembered concerning the exodus of the sons of Israel , and gave orders concerning his bones .
58011023	By faith Moses , when he was born , was hidden three months by his parents , because they saw a beautiful child ; and they did not fear the edict of the king .
58011024	By faith Moses , when he was grown up , refused to be called a son of Pharaoh's daughter ,
58011025	choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to have the temporary pleasure of sin ,
58011026	regarding the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures of Egypt ; for he was looking to the reward .
58011027	By faith he left Egypt , not fearing the anger of the king ; for he endured as seeing the Unseen [ One ] .
58011028	By faith he kept the Passover and the sprinkling of the blood , lest he who destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
58011029	By faith they passed through the Red Sea as through dry land , whereas the Egyptians , attempting to do so , were drowned .
58011030	By faith the walls of Jericho fell , having been encircled for seven days .
58011031	By faith the prositute Rahab did not perish with those who did not believe , when she had received the spies with peace .
58011032	And what more should I say ? For the time would fail me to tell of Gideon , both Barak and Samson and Jephthah , both David and Samuel and the prophets :
58011033	who through faith overcame kingdoms , worked righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
58011034	quenched the power of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , became mighty in battle , turned to flight the armies of foreigners .
58011035	Women received their dead [ back ] by resurrection . And others were tortured , not accepting deliverance , in order that they might obtain a better resurrection .
58011036	Still others took a trial of mockings and scourgings , yes , and of chains and of prison .
58011037	They were stoned , they were sawn in two , they were tried , they were slain , being murdered with the sword . They went about in sheepskins and goatskins , being in want , being afflicted , being ill treated ,
58011038	of whom the world was not worthy , wandering in deserts and mountains and caves , and the holes of the earth .
58011039	And all these , having obtained witness through their faith , did not receive the promise ,
58011040	God having provided something better for us , that they should not be made perfect apart from us .
58012001	So therefore we also , since we are surrounded by so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every impediment , and the sin which so easily ensnares us , and let us run with endurance the race that is set before us ,
58012002	looking unto Jesus , the author and perfecter of our faith , who for the joy that was set before Him endured [ the ] cross , despising the shame , and has sat down at the right hand of the throne of God .
58012003	For consider Him who endured such hostility from sinners against Himself , lest you be weary and discouraged in your souls .
58012004	You have not yet resisted to the point of bloodshed , struggling against sin .
58012005	And you have forgotten the exhortation which speaks to you as sons : " My son , do not despise the discipline of the LORD , nor be discouraged when you are reproved ;
58012006	For whom the LORD loves He disciplines , and scourges every son whom He receives . "
58012007	It is for discipline [ that ] you endure ; God deals with you as with sons . For what son is there whom a father does not discipline ?
58012008	But if you are without discipline , of which all have become partakers , then you are illegitimate and not sons .
58012009	Furthermore , we have had human fathers who corrected us , and we respected [ them . ] Shall we not much more readily be in subjection to the Father of spirits and live ?
58012010	For they indeed disciplined us for a few days , as seemed best to them , but He [ disciplines us ] for [ our ] good , so that we may partake of His holiness .
58012011	Now no discipline seems to be joyful for the present , but painful ; nevertheless , later it yields the peaceable fruit of righteousness to those having been trained by it .
58012012	Therefore strengthen the hands which are weakened , and the feeble knees ,
58012013	and make straight paths for your feet , so that the lame may not be turned aside , but rather be healed .
58012014	Pursue peace and holiness with all [ people ] , without which no one shall see the Lord :
58012015	looking diligently lest anyone fall from the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness growing up cause trouble , and through this many be defiled ;
58012016	lest there be any fornicator or profane [ person ] like Esau , who in exchange for one meal gave up his birthright .
58012017	For you know that indeed afterward , wishing to inherit the blessing , he was rejected , for he found no place for repentance , having sought it out diligently with tears .
58012018	For you have not come to the mountain that may be touched and that burned with fire , and to blackness and darkness and to a whirlwind ,
58012019	and to a sound of a trumpet and to a voice of words , which those who heard begged that no further word be spoken to them .
58012020	For they could not bear that [ which ] was commanded : " And if so much as a beast touches the mountain , it shall be stoned . "
58012021	And so fearful was the spectacle , [ that ] Moses said , " I am greatly afraid and trembling . "
58012022	But you have come to Zion , to the Mountain and city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to myriads of angels ,
58012023	to the general assembly and church of the firstborn having been enrolled in [ the ] heavens , to God the Judge of all , and to spirits of just men made perfect ,
58012024	and to Jesus , the mediator of a new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling which speaks better things than the [ blood ] of Abel .
58012025	See that you do not refuse Him who speaks . For if they did not escape , having refused Him who warned [ them ] , how much more [ shall we not escape ] if we turn away from Him who warns from heaven ;
58012026	whose voice then shook the earth ; but now He has promised , saying , " Yet once more I shake not only the earth , but also the heaven . "
58012027	Now the [ phrase ] , " Yet once more , " signifies the removal of the things being shaken , as having been made , so that the things which cannot be shaken may remain .
58012028	Therefore , since we are receiving an unshakable kingdom , let us have grace , through which we serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear .
58012029	For our God is a consuming fire .
58013001	Let brotherly love remain .
58013002	Do not forget hospitality , for by this some have entertained angels without knowing it .
58013003	Remember the prisoners as if having been bound with them , those who are ill treated , as you yourselves are in the body also .
58013004	Marriage is honorable among all , and the bed undefiled ; but fornicators and adulterers God will judge .
58013005	Let [ your ] way of life [ be ] without loving money , being satisfied with what you have . For He Himself has said , " By no means shall I desert you , nor in any way shall I forsake you ; "
58013006	so that being confident , we may say : " The LORD is my helper ; I will not fear . What can man do to me ? "
58013007	Remember your leaders , who spoke the word of God to you , of whom considering the result of their conduct , imitate their faith .
58013008	Jesus Christ is the same yesterday , today , and forever .
58013009	Do not be carried away with various and strange doctrines . For it is good [ for ] the heart to be established by grace , not by foods , by which those having walked were not profited .
58013010	We have an altar from which those who serve the tabernacle have no right to eat .
58013011	For of the animals , [ whose ] blood is brought into the Holies by the high priest [ as an offering ] for sin , the bodies [ of these animals ] are burned outside the camp .
58013012	Therefore Jesus also , so that He might sanctify the people through His own blood , suffered outside the gate .
58013013	Therefore let us go out to Him , outside the camp , bearing His reproach .
58013014	For we have no permanent city , but we seek the [ city ] which is to come .
58013015	Therefore through Him let us continually offer up a sacrifice of praise to God , that is , the fruit of our lips , confessing to His name .
58013016	But do not forget the doing of good and generosity , for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
58013017	Obey your leaders , and submit to [ them ] , for they keep watch over your souls , as giving an account , in order that they may do this with joy and not groaning , for this [ would be ] unprofitable for you .
58013018	Pray for us ; for we are persuaded that we have a good conscience , in all things desiring to live commendably .
58013019	But I especially urge [ you ] to do this , in order that I may be restored to you more quickly .
58013020	Now may the God of peace , who brought up our Lord Jesus from the dead , that great Shepherd of the sheep , by the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
58013021	make you complete in every good work to do His will , working in you what is well pleasing before Him , through Jesus Christ , to whom [ be ] glory forever and ever . Amen .
58013022	And I appeal to you , brothers , bear with this word of exhortation , for I have written to you briefly .
58013023	Know [ that ] our brother Timothy has been released , with whom I shall see you , if he comes quickly .
58013024	Greet all your leaders , and all the saints . Those from Italy greet you .
58013025	Grace be with you all . Amen .
59001001	James , a bondservant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad : Greetings .
59001002	Count it all joy , my brothers , when you fall into various trials ,
59001003	knowing that the testing of your faith produces endurance .
59001004	But let endurance have its perfect work , that you may be mature and complete , lacking nothing .
59001005	If any of you lacks wisdom , let him ask of God , who gives to all generously and without reproach , and it shall be given to him .
59001006	But let him ask in faith , doubting nothing , for he that doubts is like a wave of the sea driven and tossed by the wind .
59001007	For let not that man suppose that he shall receive anything from the Lord ;
59001008	he is a double-minded man , unstable in all his ways .
59001009	Let the lowly brother rejoice in his exaltation ,
59001010	but the rich [ man ] in his humiliation , because as a flower of the field he will pass away .
59001011	For the sun arose with burning heat and withered the grass , and its flower fell off , and its beautiful appearance perished . So the rich man also shall fade away in his pursuits .
59001012	Blessed is the man who endures temptation ; because when he is approved , he shall receive the crown of life which the Lord promised to those who love Him .
59001013	Let no one say when he is tempted , " I am tempted by God " ; for God cannot be tempted by evil , nor does He Himself tempt anyone .
59001014	But each [ one ] is tempted by his own lusts , being drawn away and being seduced [ by them ] .
59001015	Then lust , when it conceives , gives birth to sin ; and sin , when it is full-grown , brings forth death .
59001016	Do not be deceived , my beloved brothers .
59001017	Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and comes down from the Father of lights , with whom there is no variation or shadow of turning .
59001018	Exercising His will He begat us by the word of truth , that we might be a kind of firstfruits of His creatures .
59001019	So then , my beloved brothers , let every man be quick to hear , slow to speak , slow to anger ;
59001020	for the wrath of man does not produce the righteousness of God .
59001021	Therefore laying aside all filthiness and abundance of evil , in meekness receive the implanted word , which is able to save your souls .
59001022	But become doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving yourselves .
59001023	Because if anyone is a hearer of the word and not a doer , this [ one ] is like a man observing his natural face in a mirror ;
59001024	for he observed himself and has gone away , and immediately forgot what sort of [ man ] he was .
59001025	But the [ one ] who looks into the perfect law of liberty and continues [ in it ] , and is not a forgetful hearer but a doer of the work , this one shall be blessed in what he does .
59001026	If anyone among you thinks he is religious , and does not bridle his tongue but deceiving his heart , the religion of this [ man ] is useless .
59001027	Pure and undefiled religion before God and [ the ] Father is this : to care for orphans and widows in their affliction , and to keep oneself unspotted from the world .
59002001	My brothers , do not hold the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with partiality .
59002002	For if a man enters into your assembly with a gold ring , in fine clothes , and there should also come in a poor [ man ] in dirty clothes ,
59002003	and you have respect for him that wears the fine clothes and you say to him , " You sit here in a good seat , " and say to the poor man , " You stand there , " or , " Sit here under my footstool , "
59002004	and so did you not differentiate among yourselves , and become judges with evil thoughts ?
59002005	Listen , my beloved brothers . Did God not choose the poor of the world [ to be ] rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which He promised to those that love Him ?
59002006	But you have dishonored the poor . Do not the rich oppress you and drag you into court ?
59002007	Do they not blaspheme the noble name by which you are called ?
59002008	If you really fulfill the royal law according to the Scripture , " You shall love your neighbor as yourself , " you do well ;
59002009	but if you show partiality , you commit sin , and are convicted by the law as transgressors .
59002010	For whoever shall keep the whole law , and yet stumble in one [ point ] , he has become guilty of all .
59002011	For He who said , " Do not commit adultery , " also said , " You shall not murder . " Now if you do not commit adultery , but [ yet ] you murder , [ then ] you have become a transgressor of the law .
59002012	So speak and so do as those who will be judged by the law of liberty .
59002013	For judgment is without mercy to the one who does not show mercy . Mercy triumphs over judgment .
59002014	What does it profit , my brothers , if someone says he has faith but does not have works ? Is that [ kind of ] faith able to save him ?
59002015	If a brother or sister is naked and destitute of daily food ,
59002016	and one of you says to them , " Go in peace , be warmed and filled , " but you do not give them the necessary things of the body , what [ is ] the benefit ?
59002017	Thus also that faith , if it does not have works , is dead , [ being ] by itself .
59002018	But someone will say , " You have faith , and I have works . " Show me your faith [ apart ] from your works , and I will show you my faith by means of my works .
59002019	You believe God is one . You do well . Even the demons believe - and they shudder !
59002020	But do you want to know , O foolish man , that faith without works is dead ?
59002021	Was not Abraham our father justified by works when he offered Isaac his son on the altar ?
59002022	Do you see that faith was working together with his works , and by means of his works faith was made perfect ?
59002023	And the Scripture was fulfilled which says , " Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness . " And he was called a friend of God .
59002024	You see then that a man is justified by works , and not by faith only .
59002025	Likewise , was not Rahab the harlot also justified by means of works , when she received the messengers and sent [ them ] out another way ?
59002026	For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
59003001	My brothers , let not many become teachers , knowing that we shall receive greater judgment .
59003002	For we all stumble in many [ ways ] . If anyone does not stumble in word , he is a mature man , able also to bridle the whole body .
59003003	Consider that we put bits in horses' mouths that they may obey us , and we guide their whole body .
59003004	Consider also the ships : although they are so large and are driven by fierce winds , they are guided by a very small rudder wherever the impulse of the pilot desires .
59003005	Even so the tongue is a small member and it boasts great things . See how great a forest a little fire kindles !
59003006	And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity . Thus the tongue is set among our members , as that which defiles the whole body , and sets on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire by hell .
59003007	For every kind of both beasts and birds , of both reptiles and sea creatures , is tamed and has been tamed by mankind .
59003008	But no man can tame the tongue . [ It ] is an unrestrainable evil , full of deadly poison .
59003009	With it we bless our God and Father , and with it we curse men , who are created according to [ the ] likeness of God .
59003010	Out of the same mouth come blessings and curses . My brothers , these things ought not to be so .
59003011	The spring does not pour forth from the same opening [ both ] the sweet and the bitter [ water , does it ] ?
59003012	It is not possible , my brothers , [ for ] a fig tree to make olives , or a vine [ to make ] figs , [ is it ] ? Thus no spring is able to produce [ both ] salt and sweet water .
59003013	Is there anyone wise and understanding among you ? Let him show by his good conduct [ that ] his works [ are ] in meekness of wisdom .
59003014	But if you have bitter jealousy and strife in your heart , do not boast and lie against the truth .
59003015	This wisdom is not that which comes down from above , but is earthly , sensual , demonic .
59003016	For where jealousy and strife [ exist ] , there unrest and every evil deed [ are ] .
59003017	But the wisdom from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , willing to yield , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality and without hypocrisy .
59003018	Now the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace by those making peace .
59004001	From where [ come ] wars and disputes among you ? Is it not from here , from your lusts , which war in your members ?
59004002	You lust and you do not have . You murder and are jealous and you cannot obtain . You fight and make war . You do not have because you do not ask .
59004003	You ask and do not receive , because you ask with wrong motives , that you may spend [ it ] in [ gratifying ] your lusts .
59004004	Adulterers and adulteresses ! Do you not know that friendship with the world is enmity with God ? Whoever therefore wants to be a friend of the world is constituted an enemy of God .
59004005	Or do you think that the Scripture says in vain , " The Spirit who dwells in us yearns jealously " ?
59004006	But He gives more grace . Therefore He says : " God resists the proud , but gives grace to the humble . "
59004007	Therefore submit to God . Resist the devil and he will flee from you .
59004008	Draw near to God and He will draw near to you . Cleanse [ your ] hands , [ you ] sinners ; and purify [ your ] hearts , [ you ] double-minded .
59004009	Lament and mourn and weep ! Let your laughter change into mourning and your joy into dejection .
59004010	Be humbled before the Lord , and He will exalt you .
59004011	Do not speak evil of one another , brothers . He who speaks evil against a brother and judges his brother speaks against the law and judges the law . And if you judge the law , you are not a doer of the law but a judge .
59004012	There is one Lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy . But who are you who judges the other ?
59004013	Come now , you who say , " Today and tomorrow let us travel to this city , and let us spend a year there , and let us trade and make a profit " -
59004014	[ you ] who do not know [ what will ] happen tomorrow . For what is your life ? For it will be a vapor that appears for a little [ time ] , but then also disappears .
59004015	Instead you ought to say , " If the Lord wills , we shall live and do this or that . "
59004016	But now you boast in your arrogance . All such boasting is evil .
59004017	Therefore , to him who knows to do good and does not do [ it ] , to him it is sin .
59005001	Listen now , you rich , weep and howl at your miseries which are coming upon you !
59005002	Your riches have decayed , and your garments have become moth-eaten .
59005003	Your gold and silver have become corroded , and their poison will be a witness against you and will eat your flesh like fire . You stored up treasure in the last days .
59005004	Indeed , the wages of the laborers who reaped your fields , which were kept back by you , cry out , and the cries of the reapers have entered into the ears of the Lord of Hosts .
59005005	You lived luxuriously upon the earth and you lived riotously , you nourished your hearts as in a day of slaughter .
59005006	You have condemned ; you have murdered the just [ . ] He does not resist you .
59005007	Therefore be patient , brothers , until the coming of the Lord . See how the farmer awaits for the precious fruit of the earth , being patient for it , until it receives the early and late rain .
59005008	You also be patient . Establish your hearts , because the coming of the Lord has drawn near .
59005009	Do not murmur against one another , brothers , lest you be judged . Behold , the Judge stands before the doors !
59005010	My brothers , take the prophets , who spoke in the name of the Lord , as an example of evil suffering and of longsuffering .
59005011	Indeed we count those blessed who endure . You have heard of the patience of Job , and you saw the end of the Lord - that He is compassionate and He is merciful .
59005012	But above all , my brothers , do not swear , neither by heaven nor the earth , nor any other oath . But let your " Yes " be " Yes , " and [ your ] " No , " " No , " so that you may not fall into hypocrisy .
59005013	Does anyone among you suffer misfortune ? Let him pray . Is anyone cheerful ? Let him sing praises .
59005014	Is anyone among you sick ? Let him call on the elders of the church , and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord .
59005015	And the prayer of faith will save the [ one ] who is sick , and the Lord will raise him up . And if he has committed sins , it will be forgiven him .
59005016	Confess your transgressions to one another , and pray for one another , so that you may be healed . The effective prayer of the righteous is very powerful .
59005017	Elijah was a man of similar nature to us , and with a prayer , he prayed earnestly for it not to rain , and it did not rain upon the land for three years and six months .
59005018	And again he prayed , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth produced its fruit .
59005019	Brothers , if anyone among you wanders away from the truth , and anyone turns him back ,
59005020	let him know that he who turns a sinner back from the error of his way will save a soul from death and will cover a multitude of sins .
60001001	Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the elect sojourners of the Dispersion of Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
60001002	according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , in sanctification of the Spirit , for obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace to you and peace be multiplied .
60001003	Blessed [ be ] the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who according to His great mercy has begotten us again to a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
60001004	into an inheritance incorruptible and undefiled and unfading , reserved in the heavens for you ,
60001005	who by the power of God [ are ] being guarded through faith for the salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
60001006	In which you greatly rejoice , [ though for ] a little while now , if need be , you have been distressed by various trials ,
60001007	so that the genuineness of your faith , which is more precious than gold that perishes , though being tested with fire , may be found to praise , honor , and glory at the revelation of Jesus Christ .
60001008	Whom not having seen , you love , in whom now not seeing , but believing , you rejoice with inexpressible joy and glorified ,
60001009	obtaining for yourselves the outcome your faith - the salvation [ of your ] souls .
60001010	Concerning this salvation the prophets have sought out and inquired carefully , having prophesied of the grace [ that would come ] to you ,
60001011	searching for who or what kind of time the Spirit of Christ in them was revealing when He testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ and the glories which were to follow .
60001012	To them it was revealed that , not to themselves , but to you they were ministering these things , which things were now announced to you by those who proclaimed the gospel to you by the Holy Spirit sent from heaven - things which angels desire to look into .
60001013	Therefore gird up the loins of your mind , stay sober , put your hope fully in the grace brought to you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
60001014	as obedient children , not fashioning yourselves [ after ] the former lusts , [ as you did in ] your ignorance ;
60001015	but as He [ ] who called you is holy , you also be holy in all manner of life ,
60001016	because it is written , " Be holy , for I am holy . "
60001017	And if you call on the Father , who without partiality judges according to each one's work , pass the time of your sojourning [ here ] in fear ;
60001018	knowing that you were not redeemed with corruptible things , like silver or gold , from your futile way of life handed down from your forefathers ,
60001019	but with the precious blood of Christ , as of a lamb blameless and spotless ,
60001020	having been foreknown indeed before the foundation of the world , He was made manifest in these last times for you ,
60001021	who through Him believe in God , who raised Him from the dead and gave Him glory , so that your faith and hope are in God .
60001022	Since you have purified your souls by obedience to the truth through the Spirit in sincere love for the brothers , love one another fervently from a pure heart ,
60001023	having been born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , through the word of God which lives and abides forever .
60001024	For " All flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man is as the flower of [ the ] grass . The grass withers , and its flower falls away ,
60001025	but the word of the LORD endures forever . " Now this is the word which was proclaimed to you .
60002001	Therefore having put away all malice , all guile , hypocrisy , envy , and all slanders ,
60002002	as newborn babes , desire the genuine milk of the word , that by it you may grow ,
60002003	if indeed you tasted that the Lord is good .
60002004	Coming to Him as to a living stone , having been rejected indeed by men , but chosen by God and precious ,
60002005	you also , as living stones , are being built [ into ] a spiritual house , a holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ .
60002006	For it is also contained in the Scripture , " Behold , I place in Zion a chief cornerstone , chosen , precious , and he who believes on Him shall by no means be put to shame . "
60002007	Therefore , to you who believe , [ He ] is precious ; but to those who are disobedient , " The stone which the builders rejected has become the chief cornerstone , "
60002008	and " a stone of stumbling and a rock of offense . " They stumble , being disobedient to the word , to which they also were appointed .
60002009	But you are a chosen race , a royal priesthood , a holy nation , a people for God's [ own ] possession , that you may proclaim the excellent virtues of Him who called you out of darkness into His marvelous light ;
60002010	who formerly [ were ] not a people but now [ are the ] people of God , who had not received mercy , but now have received mercy .
60002011	Beloved , I implore you as sojourners and pilgrims , to abstain from the lusts of the flesh which war against the soul ;
60002012	having your manner of life noble among the Gentiles , so that , whenever they speak against you as evildoers , when they observe the good works , they may glorify God in the day of visitation .
60002013	Therefore subject yourselves to every human institution on account of the Lord : whether to the king as [ to one ] having authority ,
60002014	or to governors , as to those being sent for the punishment of evildoers and for the praise [ of those ] doing good .
60002015	For this is the will of God , that by doing good you may silence the ignorance of foolish men -
60002016	as free , yet not using freedom as a cover for wickedness , but as bondservants of God .
60002017	Honor all [ people ] . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honor the king .
60002018	Servants , subject yourselves to your masters with all fear , not only to the good and gentle , but also to the crooked .
60002019	For this is admirable , if because of conscience toward God someone endures pain , suffering unjustly .
60002020	For what glory [ is it , ] if when you sin and are beaten , you endure ? But if when you do good and suffer [ for it , ] you endure , this is admirable before God .
60002021	For to this you were called , because Christ also suffered for us , leaving behind an example for you , that you should follow in His footsteps ,
60002022	" Who committed no sin , nor was deceit found in His mouth " ;
60002023	who , being verbally abused , did not return verbal insults , when [ He ] suffered , [ He ] did not threaten , but committed [ Himself ] to Him who judges righteously ;
60002024	who Himself bore our sins in His body on the tree , in order that having died to sins , we might live unto righteousness - by whose stripes you were healed .
60002025	For you were like sheep going astray , but you have turned back now to the Shepherd and Overseer of your souls .
60003001	Wives , likewise , subject yourselves to your own husbands , so that even if some are disobedient to the word , [ that ] by the conduct of their wives , without a word , they shall be gained [ for Christ ] ,
60003002	when they observe your chaste conduct with fear .
60003003	Of whom let it not be the outward adorning of braiding of hair , and wearing of gold , or of putting on of [ fine ] clothes ,
60003004	rather [ let it be ] the hidden person of the heart , with the incorruptible [ attitude ] of a gentle and quiet spirit , which is very precious before God .
60003005	For thus formerly , the holy women who hoped on God also adorned themselves , subjecting themselves to their own husbands ,
60003006	as Sarah obeyed Abraham , calling him lord , of whom you became children , when you do good and are not afraid of any terror .
60003007	Husbands , likewise , live together according to knowledge as with a weaker vessel , with the wife , showing her honor as also a fellow heir of the grace of life , in order that your prayers may not be hindered .
60003008	Finally , all [ of you ] be like-minded , sympathetic , loving the brothers , compassionate , friendly ,
60003009	not rendering evil for evil or reviling for reviling , but on the contrary blessing , knowing that you were called for this purpose , that you may inherit a blessing .
60003010	For " He that desires to love life and see good days , let him stop his tongue from evil , and his lips from speaking guile .
60003011	Let him turn away from evil and do good ; let him seek peace and pursue it .
60003012	For the eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous , and His ears [ open ] to their prayer ; but the face of the LORD is against those doing evil . "
60003013	And who is he that shall injure you if you become imitators of that which is good ?
60003014	But even if you should suffer on account of righteousness , [ you are ] blessed . " But do not fear their threats , nor be troubled . "
60003015	But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts , and always be prepared with a defense to everyone who asks you a reason for the hope that is in you , with meekness and fear ;
60003016	having a good conscience , so that in what they speak against you as evildoers , those reviling your good conduct in Christ may be put to shame .
60003017	For it is better to suffer for doing good , if it is the will of God , than [ for ] doing evil .
60003018	For Christ also suffered once to atone for sins , [ the ] just for [ the ] unjust , that He might bring you to God , being put to death in the flesh , but made alive by the Spirit ,
60003019	by whom also He went and preached to the spirits in prison ,
60003020	who formerly disobeyed , when the longsuffering of God was waiting in the days of Noah , when the ark was being prepared , in which a few , that is , eight souls , were saved through water ;
60003021	which [ as ] an antitype , baptism now also saves us- ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but an appeal to God [ for ] a good conscience ) , through the resurrection of Jesus Christ ,
60003022	who having gone into heaven , is at the right hand of God , angels and authorities and powers being subjected to Him .
60004001	Therefore , since Christ suffered for us in the flesh , you also arm yourselves [ with ] the same mind , because he who suffered in [ the ] flesh has ceased from sin ,
60004002	that he no longer should live the remaining time in the flesh for the lusts of men , but for the will of God .
60004003	For we have spent enough of our past lifetime to accomplish the will of the Gentiles - having walked in wantonness , lusts , drunkenness , revelries , drinking parties , and abominable idolatries .
60004004	In regard to these , they are surprised that you do not run with them in the same flood of debauchery , reviling you .
60004005	They will render an account to Him who is ready to judge the living and the dead .
60004006	Unto this [ end ] was the gospel proclaimed also to those who are dead , in order that they might be judged according to men in [ the ] flesh , but [ that ] they might live according to God in [ the ] spirit .
60004007	Now the end of all things is at hand ; therefore be of sound mind and self-controlled in your prayers .
60004008	And above all things have fervent love for one another , because " love will cover a multitude of sins . "
60004009	Be hospitable to one another without grumbling .
60004010	As each one has received a gift , minister it to one another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
60004011	If anyone speaks , [ let him speak ] as the utterances of God . If anyone serves , [ let him serve ] as from strength , as God supplies , so that in all things God may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom is the glory and the power forever and ever . Amen .
60004012	Beloved , do not be surprised by the fiery trial among you , taking place to test you , as though some strange thing [ was ] happening to you ;
60004013	but inasmuch as you partake in the sufferings of Christ , rejoice , in order that also at the unveiling of His glory , you may rejoice with great happiness .
60004014	If you are reviled in the name of Christ , blessed are you , because the Spirit of glory and of God rests upon you . On the one hand He is blasphemed , but on the other He is glorified .
60004015	For let not anyone of you suffer as a murderer , or a thief , or an evildoer , or as a meddler in other people's affairs ;
60004016	but if anyone [ suffers ] as a Christian , let him not be put to shame , but let him glorify God in this matter .
60004017	For the time [ has come ] for judgment to begin at the house of God ; and if [ it begins ] with us first , what will be the end of those who are disobedient to the gospel of God ?
60004018	And " If the righteous [ one ] is scarcely saved , where will the godless and the sinner appear ? "
60004019	Therefore let those who suffer according to the will of God entrust their souls to Him in doing good , as to a faithful Creator .
60005001	The elders who are among you I exhort , as a fellow elder and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed ;
60005002	shepherd the flock of God among you , overseeing not by compulsion , but rather willingly , not in fondness for dishonest gain , but rather eagerly ;
60005003	nor as being masters over the flock [ under you , ] but rather being examples to the flock .
60005004	And when the Chief Shepherd appears , you will receive the unfading crown of glory .
60005005	Likewise , younger [ people ] , subject yourselves to [ the ] elders . And all of you be subject to one another , and be clothed with humility , because " God resists the proud , but gives grace to the humble . "
60005006	Therefore humble yourselves under the mighty hand of God , that He may exalt you in due time ,
60005007	casting all your anxiety upon Him , because He cares about you .
60005008	Be sober , be watchful ; your adversary the devil walks about as a roaring lion , seeking someone he may devour .
60005009	Resist him , being steadfast in [ your ] faith , knowing that the same sufferings are experienced by your brotherhood in the world .
60005010	But may the God of all grace , the [ One ] having called you into His eternal glory in Christ Jesus , after you have suffered a little [ while ] , may He Himself make you complete - He will establish , strengthen , [ and ] firmly ground [ you ] .
60005011	To Him be the glory and the power , forever and ever . Amen .
60005012	By Silvanus the faithful brother , as I consider him , I have written to you briefly , exhorting and testifying this to be [ the ] true grace of God in which you stand .
60005013	She who is in Babylon , elect together with you , greets you ; and so does Mark my son .
60005014	Greet one another with a kiss of love . Peace to you all who are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
61001001	Simon Peter , a bondservant and apostle of Jesus Christ , to those who have obtained like precious faith with us by [ the ] righteousness of our God and Savior Jesus Christ :
61001002	[ May ] grace and peace be multiplied [ to you ] in [ your ] knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord .
61001003	As His divine power has granted to us all things [ pertaining ] to life and godliness , through the knowledge of Him who called us by glory and virtue ,
61001004	through which have been given to us precious and exceedingly great promises , so that through these we may become partakers of the divine nature , having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
61001005	But also [ for ] this very reason , making every effort , provide with your faith virtue , and with virtue knowledge ,
61001006	and with knowledge self-control , and with self-control perseverance , and with perseverance godliness ,
61001007	and with godliness brotherly love , and with brotherly love , love .
61001008	For if these things belong to you and are increasing , it makes you neither barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	For [ he ] who lacks these things is blind , being shortsighted , having forgotten the cleansing of his past sins .
61001010	Therefore , brothers , be even more diligent to make your calling and election sure , for by doing these things you shall by no means stumble at any time .
61001011	For in this way the entrance will be supplied to you richly into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ .
61001012	Therefore I shall not neglect to constantly remind you concerning these things , although you know and have been established in the present truth .
61001013	But I consider it right , as long as I am in this tent , to stir you up by a reminder ,
61001014	knowing that the putting off of my tent is soon , just as our Lord Jesus Christ has made clear to me .
61001015	And I will make an effort also , whenever necessary , to cause you to have a reminder of these things after my departure .
61001016	For we did not follow craftily devised fables when we made known to you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but rather became eyewitnesses of His majesty .
61001017	For He received from God the Father honor and glory when a voice was brought to Him such as this by the Magnificent Glory : " This is My beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased . "
61001018	And we heard this voice being uttered from heaven , when we were with Him on the holy mountain .
61001019	And we have the prophetic word made more sure , which you do well to heed , as a lamp shining in a dark place , until the day dawns and the morning star rises in your hearts ;
61001020	knowing this first , that no prophecy of Scripture comes about [ from ] one's own interpretation ,
61001021	for prophecy never came by the will of man , but holy men of God spoke , being brought along by [ the ] Holy Spirit .
61002001	But there were also false prophets among the people , even as there will be false teachers among you , who will secretly bring in destructive heresies , even denying the Master , the [ One ] having bought them , and bringing upon themselves swift destruction .
61002002	And many will follow after their debaucheries , because of whom the way of truth will be blasphemed .
61002003	And by covetousness they will exploit you with fabricated words ; for a long time their judgment has not been idle , and their destruction will not sleep .
61002004	For if God did not spare the angels when they sinned , but rather confined [ them ] to Tartarus , and delivered [ them ] into chains of darkness , reserved for judgment ;
61002005	and did not spare the ancient world , but preserved Noah , [ the ] eighth , a preacher of righteousness , when He brought a flood upon the ungodly world ;
61002006	and reducing the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah to ashes , He condemned [ them ] to destruction , having made [ them ] an example who were to be ungodly ,
61002007	and He rescued righteous Lot , who was oppressed by the indecent conduct of lawless [ men ]
61002008	( for that righteous man , living among them day after day , tormented his righteous soul by seeing and hearing their lawless deeds ) -
61002009	[ then ] the Lord knows [ how ] to deliver the godly out of temptation and [ how ] to keep the unjust under punishment for the day of judgment ,
61002010	and especially those who walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness and despise authority . [ They are ] bold , self-willed , illustrious persons , they do not tremble at blaspheming ,
61002011	whereas angels , being greater in might and in power , do not bring a slanderous judgment against them before the Lord .
61002012	But these , as unreasoning natural animals , having been born for capture and destruction , blaspheme at things which they are ignorant of , and shall be destroyed in their destruction ,
61002013	receiving the wages of unrighteousness , counting as a pleasure to revel in the daytime , [ they are ] spots and blemishes , reveling in their deceptions while they feast with you ,
61002014	having eyes full of adultery and unable to cease from sin , enticing unstable souls , having a heart having been trained in greediness , they are accursed children .
61002015	They have left behind the straight way and have gone astray , having followed after the way of Balaam the son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ;
61002016	but he was rebuked for his own lawlessness : a dumb donkey speaking with the voice of a man restrained the madness of the prophet .
61002017	These are waterless wells , clouds being driven by a storm , for whom the darkness of the netherworld has been reserved forever .
61002018	For when they speak haughty [ words ] of emptiness , they entice through the lusts of the flesh , through lewdness , those who are escaping from those who are living in error ,
61002019	promising to them freedom , while they themselves are slaves of corruption ; for by whom anyone has been defeated , by this [ one ] also he has been enslaved .
61002020	For if having escaped from the corruptions of the world by the knowledge of the Lord and Savior Jesus Christ , yet by these , having become entangled they are defeated , the latter end has become worse for them than the first .
61002021	For it was better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than knowing it , to turn from the holy commandment delivered to them .
61002022	But it has happened to them [ according to ] the [ saying ] of the true proverb : " A dog returns to his own vomit , " and , " A sow , having washed , [ returns ] to her wallowing in the mire . "
61003001	This already , beloved , [ is ] the second letter I write to you , in [ both of ] which I stir up your pure mind by a reminder ,
61003002	to remember the words having been previously spoken by the holy prophets , and the commandment of your apostles of the Lord and Savior ;
61003003	knowing this first : that mockers will come in the last days , walking according to their own lusts ,
61003004	and saying , " Where is the promise of His coming ? For since the fathers died , all things continue as from the beginning of creation . "
61003005	For this they willingly forget : that by the word of God the heavens were of old , and [ the ] earth , consisting out of water and through water ,
61003006	by which the world at that time perished , being flooded by water ;
61003007	but the present heavens and earth , having been stored up by His word , are being reserved for fire until the day of judgment and destruction of ungodly men .
61003008	But in this let it not escape your notice , beloved , that one day with the Lord is as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
61003009	The Lord does not delay concerning His promise , as some reckon slackness , but is longsuffering toward us , not willing that any should perish , but that all should come to repentance .
61003010	But the day of the Lord shall come as a thief in the night , in which the heavens shall pass away with a rushing noise , and the elements , burning with heat , shall be dissolved , both the earth and the works that are in it shall be burned up .
61003011	Therefore , [ seeing that ] all these things shall be dissolved , what sort of [ people ] ought you to be in holy conduct and godliness ,
61003012	looking for and hastening the coming of the day of God , because of which the heavens , being set of fire , shall be dissolved , and the elements , burning with heat , shall melt ?
61003013	But according to His promise , we look for new heavens and a new earth in which righteousness dwells .
61003014	Therefore , beloved , looking forward to these things , be diligent to be found by Him in peace , without spot or blemish ;
61003015	and consider that the longsuffering of our Lord is salvation - just as also our beloved brother Paul , according to the wisdom given to him , wrote to you ,
61003016	as also in all his letters , speaking in them about these things , in which are some things hard to understand , which the unlearned and unstable twist to their own destruction , as they do also the rest of the Scriptures .
61003017	You therefore , beloved , knowing this beforehand , be on guard , lest you also fall from your own steadfastness , being carried away by the error of the wicked ;
61003018	but grow in grace and in the knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ . To Him [ be ] the glory both now and forever . Amen .
62001001	That which was from the beginning , which we have heard , which we have seen with our eyes , which we have gazed upon , and our hands have handled , concerning the Word of life -
62001002	and the life was manifested , and we have seen , and bear witness , and we declare to you the eternal life which was with the Father and was manifested to us -
62001003	that which we have seen and heard we declare to you , in order that you also may have fellowship with us ; and indeed our fellowship is with the Father and with His Son Jesus Christ .
62001004	And these things we write to you that our joy may be fulfilled .
62001005	And this is the message which we have heard from Him and we announce to you , that God is light and in Him is no darkness at all .
62001006	If we claim that we have fellowship with Him , and we are walking in the darkness , we are lying , and are not practicing the truth .
62001007	But if we are walking in the light , as He is in the light , we have fellowship with one another , and the blood of Jesus Christ His Son cleanses us from all sin .
62001008	If we claim that we have no sin , we are deceiving ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
62001009	If we confess our sins , He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
62001010	If we claim that we have not sinned , we make Him a liar , and His word is not in us .
62002001	My little children , these things I write to you , that you may not sin . And if someone should sin , we have an Advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous .
62002002	And He Himself is the propitiation for our sins , and not only concerning ours , but also concerning [ those ] of the whole world .
62002003	Now by this we know that we have come to know Him , if we keep His commandments .
62002004	He who says , " I have come to know Him , " and does not keep His commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
62002005	But whoever keeps His word , truly the love of God is perfected in him . By this we know that we are in Him .
62002006	He who claims to abide in Him ought himself also to walk just as He walked .
62002007	Brothers , I am not writing a new commandment to you , but an old commandment which you have had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word which you heard from the beginning .
62002008	Again , a new commandment I am writing to you , which [ thing ] is true in Him and in you , because the darkness is passing away , and the true light already shines .
62002009	He who says that he is in the light , and hates his brother , is in darkness until now .
62002010	He who loves his brother abides in the light , and there is no cause for stumbling in him .
62002011	But he who hates his brother is in darkness and walks in darkness , and does not know where he is going , because the darkness has blinded his eyes .
62002012	I am writing to you , little children , because your sins have been forgiven you on account of His name .
62002013	I am writing to you , fathers , because you have come to know Him [ who is ] from the beginning . I am writing to you , young men , because you have overcome the evil [ one ] . I am writing to you , little children , because you have come to know the Father .
62002014	I wrote to you , fathers , because you have come to know Him [ who is ] from the beginning . I wrote to you , young men , because you are strong , and the word of God abides in you , and you have overcome the evil [ one ] .
62002015	Do not love the world nor the things in the world . If anyone loves the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
62002016	Because everything that is in the world - the lust of the flesh , and the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life - is not from the Father but is from the world .
62002017	And the world is passing away , and its lust ; but he who does the will of God abides forever .
62002018	Little children , it is the last hour ; and just as you have heard that the Antichrist is coming , even now many antichrists have appeared ; from this we know that it is the last hour .
62002019	They went out from us , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , they would have remained with us ; but [ they went out ] in order that they might be made manifest , that none of them were of us .
62002020	But you have an anointing from the Holy One , and you know all things .
62002021	I did not write to you because you do not know the truth , but because you know it , and because no lie is of the truth .
62002022	Who is a liar but the [ one ] who denies that Jesus is the Christ ? This is the antichrist , the [ one ] who denies the Father and the Son .
62002023	Everyone who denies the Son does not have the Father either .
62002024	Therefore let that which you heard from the beginning abide in you . If what you heard from the beginning abides in you , you also will abide in the Son and in the Father .
62002025	And this is the promise which He Himself promised to you - eternal life .
62002026	These things I wrote to you concerning those who deceive you .
62002027	And [ as for ] you , the anointing which you have received from Him abides in you , and you have no need that anyone teach you ; but as the same anointing teaches you concerning all things , and is true , and is not a lie , and just as it has taught you , you will abide in Him .
62002028	And now , little children , abide in Him , in order that when He appears , we may have confidence and not be ashamed due to Him at His coming .
62002029	If you know that He is righteous , you know that everyone who practices righteousness has been born of Him .
62003001	Behold what manner of love the Father has bestowed on us , that we should be called children of God ! On account of this the world does not know you , because it did not know Him .
62003002	Beloved , now we are children of God ; and it has not yet been revealed what we shall be , but we know that when He appears , we shall be like Him , because we shall see Him as He is .
62003003	And everyone who has this hope in Him purifies himself , just as He is pure .
62003004	Everyone who practices sin also practices lawlessness , and sin is lawlessness .
62003005	And you know that He appeared that He might take away our sins , and in Him there is no sin .
62003006	Everyone who abides in Him does not sin ; everyone who sins has not seen Him nor has he known Him .
62003007	Little children , let no one deceive you . The [ one ] who practices righteousness is righteous , just as He is righteous .
62003008	He who practices sin is of the devil , for the devil has been sinning from the beginning . For this [ reason ] the Son of God appeared , that He might destroy the works of the devil .
62003009	No one who has been born of God practices sin , because His seed abides in him ; and he cannot sin , because he has been born of God .
62003010	By this the children of God and the children of the devil are manifest : Everyone who does not practice righteousness is not of God , nor is he who does not love his brother .
62003011	Because this is the message which you heard from the beginning , that we should love one another ,
62003012	not as Cain who was of the evil one and slew his brother . And for what reason did he slay him ? Because his works were evil and the [ works ] of his brother were righteous .
62003013	Do not marvel , my brothers , if the world hates you .
62003014	We know that we have passed from death to life , because we love the brothers . He who does not love his brother abides in death .
62003015	Everyone who hates his brother is a murderer , and you know that no murderer has eternal life abiding in him .
62003016	By this we have come to know love , because He laid down His life for us . And we also ought to lay down our lives on behalf of our brothers .
62003017	But whoever has this world's goods , and sees his brother having need , and shuts off his compassion towards him , how does the love of God abide in him ?
62003018	My little children , let us not love in word or in tongue , but in deed and in truth .
62003019	And in this we know that we are from the truth , and shall assure our hearts before Him .
62003020	Because if our heart condemns us , God is greater than our heart , and He knows all things .
62003021	Beloved , if our heart does not condemn us , we have confidence toward God .
62003022	And whatever we should ask we receive from Him , because we keep His commandments and we do the things pleasing before Him .
62003023	And this is His commandment : that we should believe in the name of His Son Jesus Christ and should love one another , just as He gave commandment .
62003024	And the [ one ] who keeps His commandments abides in Him , and He in him . And by this we know that He abides in us , from the Spirit whom He gave us .
62004001	Beloved , do not believe every spirit , but test the spirits , whether they are from God ; because many false prophets have gone out into the world .
62004002	By this the Spirit of God is known : Every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God ,
62004003	and every spirit which does not confess that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is not of God . And this is the [ spirit ] of the Antichrist , which you have heard that it is coming , and now is already in the world .
62004004	You are of God , little children , and you have overcome them , because He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world .
62004005	They are of the world : on account of this they speak of the world , and the world hears them .
62004006	We are of God . He that knows God hears us ; [ he ] that is not of God does not hear us . By this we know the spirit of truth and the spirit of error .
62004007	Beloved , let us love one another , because love is of God ; and everyone that loves has been born of God and knows God .
62004008	He that does not love does not know God , because God is love .
62004009	By this the love of God is manifested in us , that God has sent His only begotten Son into the world , in order that we might live through Him .
62004010	In this is love , not that we loved God , but that He loved us and sent His Son [ to be ] the propitiation for our sins .
62004011	Beloved , if in this way God loved us , indeed we ought to love one another .
62004012	No one has ever seen God . If we love one another , God abides in us , and His love has been perfected in us .
62004013	( By this we know that we abide in Him , and He in us , because He has given us of His Spirit . )
62004014	And we have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son as Savior of the world .
62004015	Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God , God abides in him , and he in God .
62004016	And we have come to know and believe the love which God has in us . God is love , and he that abides in love abides in God , and God abides in him .
62004017	By this love has been perfected with us : that we may have confidence in the day of judgment ; because just as He is , we also are in this world .
62004018	There is no fear in love ; but perfect love casts out fear , because fear involves punishment . But he that fears has not been made perfect in love .
62004019	We love Him because He first loved us .
62004020	If anyone claims , " I love God , " and hates his brother , he is a liar ; for he who does not love his brother whom he has seen , how is it possible [ for him ] to love God whom he has not seen ?
62004021	And this commandment we have from Him : that he who loves God should love his brother also .
62005001	Everyone that believes that Jesus is the Christ has been born of God , and everyone that loves Him that begot also loves him that is begotten of Him .
62005002	By this we know that we love the children of God , whenever we love God and keep His commandments .
62005003	For this is the love of God , that we keep His commandments . And His commandments are not burdensome ,
62005004	because everything having been born of God overcomes the world : and this is the victory that has overcome the world - your faith .
62005005	Who is he that overcomes the world , if not he that believes that Jesus is the Son of God ?
62005006	This is He who came through water and blood - Jesus Christ , not only by the water , but by the water and the blood . And the Spirit is He [ ] who witnesses , because the Spirit is the truth .
62005007	For there are three that bear witness :
62005008	the Spirit , the water , and the blood ; and these three agree as one .
62005009	If we receive the testimony of men , the testimony of God is greater ; because this is the testimony of God which He has testified concerning His Son .
62005010	He that believes in the Son of God has the testimony in himself ; he that does not believe God has made Him a liar , because he has not believed in the testimony which God has testified concerning His Son .
62005011	And this is the testimony : that God has given to us eternal life , and this life is in His Son .
62005012	He that has the Son has life ; he that does not have the Son of God does not have life .
62005013	These things I write to you who believe in the name of the Son of God , that you may know that you have eternal life , and that you may believe in the name of the Son of God .
62005014	And this is the confidence that we have toward Him , that if we should ask anything according to His will , He hears us .
62005015	And if we know that He hears us , whatever we may ask , we know that we have the requests that we have requested from Him .
62005016	If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin not [ leading ] to death , he shall ask , and He shall give him life for those who do not sin unto death . There is a sin [ leading ] to death . I do not say that he should ask about that .
62005017	All unrighteousness is sin , and there is sin not [ leading ] to death .
62005018	We know that everyone begotten of God does not sin ; but he that was begotten of God keeps himself , and the evil [ one ] does not touch him .
62005019	We know that we are from God , and the whole world lies [ under the sway ] of the evil [ one ] .
62005020	And we know that the Son of God has come and has given us an understanding , that we may know Him that is true ; and we are in Him that is true , in His Son Jesus Christ . He is the true God and eternal life .
62005021	Little children , guard yourselves from idols . Amen .
63001001	THE ELDER , To the elect lady and her children , whom I love in truth , and not only I , but also all those who have come to know the truth ,
63001002	on account of the truth which abides in us and will be with us forever :
63001003	Grace , mercy , and peace will be with us from God [ the ] Father and from [ the ] Lord Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
63001004	I rejoiced greatly that I have found some of your children walking in truth , just as we received commandment from the Father .
63001005	And now I ask you , lady , not as writing a new commandment to you , but one which we have had from the beginning : that we love one another .
63001006	This is love , that we walk according to His commandments . This is the commandment , that as you have heard from the beginning , that you should walk in it .
63001007	Because many deceivers have gone out into the world who do not confess Jesus Christ as coming in [ the ] flesh . This is the deceiver and the antichrist .
63001008	Look to yourselves , lest we should lose those things for which we worked , but that we should receive a full reward .
63001009	Everyone who transgresses and does not abide in the doctrine of Christ does not have God . He who abides in the doctrine of Christ , this [ one ] has both the Father and the Son .
63001010	If anyone comes to you and does not bring this doctrine , do not receive him into your house , and do not greet him ;
63001011	for he who greets him shares in his evil works .
63001012	Although I had many things to write to you , I did not wish to do so with paper and ink ; but I hope to come to you and speak face to face , in order that our joy may be fulfilled .
63001013	The children of your elect sister greet you . Amen .
64001001	THE ELDER , To the beloved Gaius , whom I love in truth :
64001002	Beloved , concerning all things I pray you to prosper and to be healthy , just as your soul prospers .
64001003	For I rejoiced greatly when [ the ] brothers came and witnessed to the truth which is in you , just as you walk in truth .
64001004	I have no greater joy than these things , that I hear [ that ] my children are walking in truth .
64001005	Beloved , you do faithfully whatever you work for the brothers and for strangers ,
64001006	who gave testimony concerning your love before the church , [ with reference ] to whom you will do well if you send them forth in a manner worthy of God ,
64001007	for on behalf of the Name they went out , taking nothing from the pagans .
64001008	We therefore ought to receive such , in order that we may become fellow workers with the truth .
64001009	I wrote to the church , but Diotrephes , who loves the preeminence over them , does not receive us .
64001010	On account of this , if I come , I will call to mind his works which he does , slandering us with evil words . And not being content with that , he does not receive the brothers , and hinders those who desire to , casting them out of the church .
64001011	Beloved , do not imitate the evil , but the good . He that does good is of God ; he that does evil has not seen God .
64001012	Demetrius has a good testimony with everyone , and of the truth itself . And we also testify , and you know that our testimony is true .
64001013	I had many things to write , but I do not wish to write to you with pen and ink .
64001014	But I wish to see you shortly , and we shall speak face to face . Peace to you . Our friends greet you . Greet the friends by name .
