65001001	Jude , a bondservant of Jesus Christ , and brother of James , to those who are called , having been sanctified by God the Father , and having been kept in Jesus Christ :
65001002	[ May ] mercy , peace , and love be multiplied to you .
65001003	Beloved , while I was very diligent to write to you about our common salvation , it became necessary to write to you exhorting you to earnestly contend for the faith which was once for all delivered to the saints .
65001004	For certain men have crept in unawares , who long ago were marked out for this condemnation , ungodly men , changing the grace of our God into licentiousness and denying the only Master God and our Lord Jesus Christ .
65001005	Now I want to remind you , although you once knew this , that the Lord , having saved the people out of the land of Egypt , afterward destroyed those who did not believe .
65001006	And the angels who did not keep their own domain , but rather having left their own habitation , He has kept with everlasting chains under darkness for the judgment of the great day ;
65001007	as Sodom and Gomorrah , and the cities around them in a similar manner to these , having given themselves over to fornication and having gone after other flesh , are set forth as an example , suffering the vengeance of eternal fire .
65001008	Likewise indeed even these [ filthy ] dreamers defile the flesh , reject authority , and blaspheme glories .
65001009	Yet Michael the archangel , when taking issue with the devil , was arguing about the body of Moses , dared not to bring a railing accusation , but said , " The Lord rebuke you ! "
65001010	But these speak blasphemously of those things which they do not know ; but what they do know naturally , like unreasoning animals , they are destroyed by these things .
65001011	Woe to them ! For they have gone in the way of Cain , and in the error of Balaam they have rushed for profit , and have perished in the rebellion of Korah .
65001012	These are stains in your love feasts , while they feast [ with you ] without fear , caring for themselves , they are waterless clouds being carried along by winds ; late autumn trees unfruitful , twice having died , having been uprooted ,
65001013	raging waves on the sea , casting up the foam of their own shame ; wandering stars for whom the darkness of the netherworld has been reserved forever .
65001014	Now Enoch , the seventh from Adam , prophesied about these men , saying , " Behold , the Lord comes with ten thousands of His saints ,
65001015	to execute judgment against all , and to convict all the ungodly among them about all their ungodly deeds which they have committed impiously , and about all the harsh [ words ] which ungodly sinners have spoken against Him . "
65001016	These are murmurers , complainers , walking after their own lusts ; and their mouth speaks puffed up words , flattering people to gain advantage .
65001017	But you , beloved , remember the words which were spoken beforehand by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
65001018	how they told you that in the last time there would be mockers , walking according to their own ungodly lusts .
65001019	These are those who cause divisions , wordly , devoid of [ the ] Spirit .
65001020	But you , beloved , building yourselves up in your most holy faith , praying in the Holy Spirit ,
65001021	keep yourselves in the love of God , anticipating the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to eternal life .
65001022	And have mercy on some , making a distinction ;
65001023	but others save with fear , snatching them out of the fire , hating even the garment having been stained by the flesh .
65001024	Now to Him who is able to keep them from stumbling , and to make you stand before His glory , blameless with exultation ,
65001025	To the only wise God our Savior , [ be ] glory and majesty , dominion and power , both now and forever . Amen .

66006002	And behold , a white horse . And he who sat on it had a bow ; and a crown was given to him , and he went out conquering , and to conquer .
66006003	And when He opened the second seal , I heard the second living being saying , " Come ! "
66006004	Another horse went out , fiery red , and it was granted to him that sat on it to take peace from the earth , so that they might kill each other ; and there was given to him a great sword .

66006006	And I heard a voice in the midst of the four living beings , saying , " A quart of wheat for a denarius , and three quarts of barley for a denarius ; but do not harm the oil and the wine . "

66006008	And behold , a pale horse , and he who sat on it was named Death , and Hades was following him . And authority was given to him over a fourth of the earth , to kill with [ the ] sword , and with famine , and with death , and by the wild beasts of the earth .
66006009	And when He opened the fifth seal , I saw underneath the altar the souls of them that were slain for the word of God , and for the testimony which they held .
66006010	And they cried [ with ] a loud voice , saying , " How long , O Lord , holy and true , do You not judge and avenge our blood on them that dwell on the earth ? "

66006012	And I saw when He opened the sixth seal , that there was a great earthquake ; and the sun became black as sackcloth of hair , and the whole moon became like blood .
66006013	And the stars of heaven fell to the earth , like a fig tree casting its untimely figs , being shaken by a mighty wind .
66006014	Then the sky was split like a scroll being rolled up , and every mountain and island were removed out of their places .
66006015	And the kings of the earth , and the magnates and the high-ranking military men , and the rich and the mighty , and every slave and every free man , hid themselves in the caves and in the crags of the mountains .
66006016	And they said to the mountains and crags , " Fall on us and hide us from [ the ] face of Him that sits on the throne , and from the wrath of the Lamb !
66006017	For the great day of His wrath has come , and who shall be able to stand ? "
66007001	And after this I saw four angels standing at the four corners of the earth , holding the four winds of the earth , so that a wind should not blow on the earth , nor on the sea , nor on any tree .
66007002	Then I saw another angel coming up from the east , having the seal of the living God . And he cried with a loud voice to the four angels to whom it had been granted to harm the earth and the sea ,
66007003	saying , " Do not harm the earth , nor the sea , nor the trees , until we have sealed the servants of our God on their foreheads . "
66007004	And I heard the number of those having been sealed , one hundred and forty-four thousand having been sealed out of every tribe of the sons of Israel :
66007005	of the tribe of Judah twelve thousand having been sealed ; of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand ;
66007006	of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand ;
66007007	of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand ;
66007008	of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousand ; of the tribe of Benjamin twelve thousand , having been sealed .
66007009	After these things I looked , and behold , a great multitude which no man could number , out of every nation , and [ from ] tribes and peoples and languages , standing before the throne and before the Lamb , having been clothed in long white robes , with palm branches in their hands .
66007010	And they cried out with a loud voice , saying , " Salvation [ belongs ] to our God , to Him who sits on the throne , and to the Lamb ! "
66007011	And all the angels stood around the throne , and the elders and the four living beings , and they fell down on their faces before His throne and they worshipped God ,
66007012	saying : " Amen ! Blessing and glory and wisdom , and thanksgiving and honor and power and might , [ be ] to our God forever and ever . Amen . "
66007013	Then one of the elders answered , saying to me , " Who are these arrayed in long white robes , and where did they come from ? "
66007014	And I said to him , " My lord , you know . " So he said to me , " These are those who come out of the Great Tribulation , and have washed their robes and they made them white in the blood of the Lamb .
66007015	Therefore they are before the throne of God , and they serve Him day and night in His temple . And He that sits on the throne shall dwell among them .
66007016	They shall neither hunger anymore nor thirst anymore ; nor shall the sun by any means strike them , nor any scorching heat ;
66007017	because the Lamb who is in the midst of the throne shepherds them , and He leads them to [ the ] springs of [ the ] waters of life . And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes . "
66008001	And when He opened the seventh seal , silence occurred in heaven [ for ] about half an hour .
66008002	And I saw the seven angels who stood before God , and seven trumpets were given to them .
66008003	Then another angel , having a golden censer , came and stood at the altar . And much incense was given to him , so that he could offer it with the prayers of all the saints upon the golden altar which is before the throne .
66008004	And the smoke of the incense went up with the prayers of the saints out of the hand of the angel before God .
66008005	And the angel took the censer , and filled it with fire from the altar , and he cast it to the earth . And there were thunders and voices and lightnings and an earthquake .
66008006	So the seven angels who had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound the trumpets .
66008007	And the first [ one ] sounded [ his ] trumpet , and there was hail and fire , having been mixed with blood , and they were thrown to the earth ; and a third of the earth was burned up , and a third of the trees was burned up , and all green grass was burned up .
66008008	Then the second angel sounded [ his ] trumpet , and [ something ] like a great burning mountain was cast into the sea , and a third of the sea became blood .
66008009	And a third of the living creatures in the sea died , and a third of the ships were destroyed .
66008010	Then the third angel sounded [ his ] trumpet , and a great star fell from heaven , burning like a torch , and it fell on a third of the rivers and on the fountains of water .
66008011	And the name of the star is called Wormwood . And a third of the waters turned into wormwood , and many men died from the waters , because they were made bitter .
66008012	Then the fourth angel sounded [ his ] trumpet , and a third of the sun was struck , a third of the moon , and a third of the stars , so that a third of them was darkened . A third of the day did not shine , and likewise the night .
66008013	And I saw , and I heard an eagle flying through the midst of heaven , saying with a loud voice , " Woe , woe , woe [ for ] those who dwell on the earth , from the remaining blasts of the trumpet of the three angels who are to sound [ their ] trumpets ! "
66009001	Then the fifth angel sounded [ his ] trumpet , and I saw a star having fallen out of heaven , to the earth . And the key of the shaft of the bottomless pit was given to him .
66009002	And he opened the shaft of the bottomless pit , and smoke arose out of the pit like the smoke of a burning furnace . And the sun was darkened , and the air , from the smoke of the shaft .
66009003	Then out of the smoke came forth locusts to the earth . And power was given to them , as scorpions of the earth have power .
66009004	They were told not to harm the grass of the earth , nor any plant , nor any tree , but [ only ] those men who do not have the seal of God on their foreheads .
66009005	And they were not given authority to kill them , but that they should torment them for five months . And their torment was like the torment of a scorpion when it strikes a man .
66009006	And in those days men shall seek death , and shall by no means find it ; they shall be longing to die , yet death shall elude them .
66009007	And the appearances of the locusts [ was ] similar to horses having been prepared for battle , and on their heads [ were ] like crowns of gold , and their faces [ were ] like the faces of men .
66009008	They had hair like women's hair , and their teeth were like the teeth of lions .
66009009	And they had breastplates like breastplates of iron , and the sound of their wings [ was ] as the sound of chariots with many horses rushing into battle .
66009010	And they had tails like scorpions , and stings . And in their tails they have power to harm men five months ,
66009011	having as a king over them the angel of the bottomless pit ; whose name in Hebrew is Abaddon , but in Greek he has the name Apollyon .
66009012	One woe is past . Behold , yet two woes are coming after these things .
66009013	Then the sixth angel sounded [ his ] trumpet , and I heard a voice from the four horns of the golden altar which is before God ,
66009014	saying to the sixth angel who had the trumpet , " Release the four angels having been bound at the great river Euphrates . "
66009015	So the four angels were released , who had been prepared for the hour and day and month and year , so that they might kill a third of mankind .
66009016	Now the number of the troops of the horsemen was a hundred million ; I heard the number of them .
66009017	And thus I saw the horses in the vision , and those who rode on them , having breastplates of fire , hyacinth , and brimstone ; and the heads of the horses [ were ] like the heads of lions ; and out of their mouths issued fire , and smoke , and brimstone .
66009018	By these three plagues a third of mankind was killed - from the fire and the smoke and the brimstone proceeding out of their mouths .
66009019	For the power of the horses is in their mouth and in their tails ; for their tails are like serpents , having heads ; and with them they do harm .
66009020	But the rest of mankind , who were not killed by these plagues , did not repent from the works of their hands , that they should not worship demons , and idols of gold , silver , bronze , stone , and of wood , which neither are able to see nor to hear nor to walk .
66009021	And they did not repent of their murders , nor of their drugs , nor of their fornication or their thefts .
66010001	And I saw a mighty angel coming down from heaven , having been clothed with a cloud , and a rainbow on his head , and his face [ was ] like the sun , and his feet like pillars of fire ,
66010002	and having in his hand a scroll having been opened . And he put his right foot on the sea , but his left [ one ] on the land ,
66010003	and cried with a loud voice , as [ when ] a lion roars . And when he cried out , the seven thunders uttered their own voices .
66010004	Now when the seven thunders spoke , I was about to write . But I heard a voice from heaven saying , " Seal up the things which the seven thunders said , and after these things you shall write . "
66010005	And the angel whom I saw standing on the sea and on the land raised his right hand to heaven
66010006	and swore by Him who lives forever and ever , who created the heaven and the things in it , the earth and the things in it , and the sea and the things in it , that there should be no more delay ;
66010007	but in the days of the voice of the seventh angel , whenever he is about to sound [ his ] trumpet , the mystery of God would be finished , as He declared to His servants the prophets .
66010008	Then the voice which I heard from heaven [ was ] speaking with me again and saying , " Go , take the little scroll which was open in the hand of the angel standing on the sea and on the land . "
66010009	And I went to the angel , saying to him to give to me the little scroll . And he said to me , " Take [ it ] and eat it up ; and it shall make your stomach bitter , but it shall be as sweet as honey in your mouth . "
66010010	Then I took the scroll out of the angel's hand and ate it , and it was as sweet as honey in my mouth . And when I ate it , my stomach was made bitter .
66010011	And they said to me , " You must prophesy again over many peoples , nations , languages , and kings . "

66011003	And I will give [ power ] to My two witnesses , and they shall prophesy one thousand two hundred and sixty days , having been clothed in sackcloth . "
66011004	These are the two olive trees and the two lampstands which [ are ] standing before the Lord of the earth .

66011010	And those who dwell on the earth rejoice over them , and make merry , and give gifts to one another , because these two prophets tormented those who dwell on the earth .

66011013	In that day there was a great earthquake , and a tenth of the city fell , and seven thousand men were killed . And the rest became fearful and gave glory to the God of heaven .
66011014	The second woe is past . Behold , the third woe is coming quickly .

"

66013001	Then I stood on the sand of the sea . And I saw a Beast coming up out of the sea , having seven heads and ten horns , and on his horns ten crowns , and on his heads blasphemous names .

66017001	Then one of the seven angels having the seven bowls came and spoke with me , saying , " Come , I will show you the judgment of the great harlot who sits on many waters ,

66018001	After these things I saw another angel coming down from heaven , having great authority , and the earth was lit up from his splendor .

66018007	In as many things as she glorified herself and lived luxuriously , in the same measure give to her torment and sorrow ; because she says in her heart , ' I sit as queen , and am not a widow , and I shall by no means see sorrow . '
66018008	" On account of this her plagues will come in one day - death , sorrow , and famine . And she shall be burned with fire , for strong is the Lord God who has judged her .
66018009	" The kings of the earth who committed fornication and lived luxuriously with her shall weep and mourn over her , when they see the smoke of her burning ,
66018010	standing from afar on account of the fear of her torment , saying , ' Alas , alas , that great city Babylon , that mighty city ! Because in one hour your judgment came . '
66018011	" And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her , for no one buys their merchandise anymore :
66018012	merchandise of gold and silver , precious stones and pearls , fine linen and purple , silk and scarlet , every kind of citron wood , every kind of object of ivory , every kind of object of most precious wood , bronze , iron , and marble ;
66018013	and cinnamon and incense , perfume and frankincense , wine and oil , fine flour and wheat , cattle and sheep , horses and chariots , and bodies and souls of men .
66018014	The fruit that your soul longed for has gone from you , and all the sumptuous things and the gaudy things have perished from you , and you shall by no means find them no more .
66018015	The merchants of these things , who became rich from her , shall stand at afar on account of the fear of her torment , both weeping and sorrowing ,
66018016	and saying , ' Alas , alas , that great city , she who was clothed in fine linen , purple , and scarlet , and having been gilded with gold and precious stones and pearls !
66018017	Because in one hour such great wealth was laid waste . ' And every captain , and all those sailing along the coast , and sailors , and as many as work on the sea , stood from afar
66018018	and were crying out , seeing the smoke of her burning , saying , ' Who is like this great city ? '
66018019	" And they threw dust on their heads and were crying out , weeping and sorrowing , and saying , ' Alas , alas , that great city , by which all who had ships on the sea became rich by her wealth ! Because in one hour she was laid waste . '
66018020	" Rejoice over her , O heaven , and you saints and apostles and prophets , because God has pronounced judgment for you against her ! "
66018021	Then a mighty angel picked up a stone like a great millstone and threw it into the sea , saying , " Thus with violence Babylon the great city shall be cast down , and shall by no means be found anymore .
66018022	The sound of harpists , and musicians , and of flutists , and of trumpeters shall by no means be heard in you anymore . And no craftsman of any craft shall by no means be found in you anymore , and the sound of a mill shall by no means be heard in you anymore .
66018023	And the light of a lamp shall by no means shine in you anymore , and the voice of bridegroom and of a bride shall by no means be heard in you anymore . Your merchants were the magnates of the earth , for by your sorcery all the nations were deceived .
66018024	And in her was found the blood of prophets and saints , and of all those who had been slain on the earth . "
66019001	After these things I heard as [ it were ] a loud voice of a great multitude in heaven , saying , " Hallelujah ! Salvation and glory and power belong to our God !
66019002	For true and righteous are His judgments , for He has judged the great harlot who corrupted the earth with her fornication ; and He has avenged the blood of His servants [ shed ] by her hand . "
66019003	And a second [ one ] said , " Hallelujah ! Her smoke goes up forever and ever ! "
66019004	And the twenty-four elders and the four living beings fell down and worshipped God who sits on the throne , saying , " Amen ! Hallelujah ! "
66019005	Then a voice came from the throne , saying , " Praise our God , all His servants and those who fear Him , both small and great ! "
66019006	And I heard , as [ it were ] , the voice of a great multitude , and like the sound of many waters , and like the sound of mighty thunders , saying , " Hallelujah ! For the Lord God Almighty has begun to reign !
66019007	Let us rejoice and be exceedingly glad , and let us give Him glory , for the wedding of the Lamb has come , and His wife has prepared herself . "
66019008	And to her it was granted that she should be dressed in fine linen , bright and pure , for the fine linen is the righteous deeds of the saints .
66019009	Then he said to me , " Write : ' Blessed are those who are invited to the marriage supper of the Lamb ! ' " And he said to me , " These are the true words of God . "
66019010	And I fell before his feet to worship him . But he said to me , " See [ that you do ] not ! I am your fellow servant , and of your brothers who have the testimony of Jesus . Worship God ! For the testimony of Jesus is the spirit of prophecy . "
66019011	And I saw heaven opened , and behold , a white horse . And He who sat on him was called Faithful and True , and in righteousness He judges and makes war .
66019012	His eyes were as a flame of fire , and on His head were many crowns , having names written , and a name written that no one knows except Himself .
66019013	And He is clothed in a robe having been dipped in blood , and His name is called The Word of God .
66019014	And the armies in heaven were following Him on white horses , having been dressed in fine linen , white and clean .
66019015	And out of His mouth proceeds a sharp , double-edged sword , so that with it He might strike the nations . And He will shepherd them with an iron rod . And He treads the winepress of the wine of the wrath of Almighty God .
66019016	And He has on His robe and on His thigh a name having been written : KING OF KINGS AND LORD OF LORDS .
66019017	Then I saw an angel standing in the sun ; and he cried with a loud voice , saying to all the birds that fly in the midst of heaven , " Come and gather together for the great supper of God ,
66019018	so that you may eat the flesh of kings , the flesh of captains , the flesh of mighty men , the flesh of horses and of those who ride on them , and the flesh of all people , free and slave , both small and great . "
66019019	And I saw the Beast and the kings of the earth and their armies , having been gathered together to make war against Him who rode on the horse and against His army .
66019020	Then the Beast was apprehended , and with him the False Prophet who had performed the signs before him , by which he had deceived those who received the mark of the Beast and those who worshipped his image . These two were thrown alive into the lake of fire burning with brimstone .
66019021	And the rest were slain with the sword which proceeds from the mouth of Him who rode on the horse . And all the birds gorged themselves with their flesh .
66020001	Then I saw an angel coming down from heaven , having the key to the bottomless pit and a great chain in his hand .
66020002	And he seized the dragon , that serpent of old , who is [ the ] Devil and Satan , he who deceives the whole world , and he bound him for a thousand years ;
66020003	and he cast him into the bottomless pit , and locked and sealed [ it ] over him , so that he should deceive the nations no more until the thousand years were finished . [ But ] after these things he must be released for a short time .
66020004	And I saw thrones , and they sat on them , and judgment was given to them , and the souls of those who had been beheaded on account of the testimony of Jesus , and on account of the word of God , and those who had not worshipped the Beast or his image , and they did not receive the mark on their forehead or on their hand . And they came to life and reigned with Christ [ for ] the thousand years .
66020005	But the rest of the dead did not come to life until the thousand years were finished . This is the first resurrection .
66020006	Blessed and holy is he that has part in the first resurrection . Over these the second death has no power , but they shall be priests of God and of Christ , and shall reign with Him for a thousand years .
66020007	Now after the thousand years , Satan will be released from his prison ,
66020008	and he will come out to deceive the nations which are in the four corners of the earth , Gog and Magog , to gather them together to the war , whose number is like the sand of the sea .

66020010	And the devil , who deceived them , was thrown into the lake of fire and brimstone where also the Beast and the False Prophet [ are ] . And they shall be tormented day and night forever and ever .
66020011	Then I saw a great white throne and He who sat on it , from whose face the earth and the heaven fled . And no place was found for them .
66020012	And I saw the dead , the great and the small , standing before the throne , and they opened the books . And another book was opened , which is [ the Book ] of Life . And the dead were judged by the things having been written in the books , according to their works .
66020013	And the sea gave up the dead who were in it , and Death and Hades gave up the dead who were in them . And they were judged , each one according to their works .
66020014	Then Death and Hades were thrown into the lake of fire . This is the second death , the lake of fire .
66020015	And if anyone was not found having been written in the Book of Life , he was cast into the lake of fire .
66021001	And I saw a new heaven and a new earth , for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away . And there was no more sea .
66021002	Then I saw the holy city , New Jerusalem , coming down out of heaven from God , having been prepared like a bride having been adorned for her husband .

66021004	And He shall wipe away every tear from their eyes ; and there shall be no more death , nor sorrow , nor crying out ; neither shall there be any more pain , for the former things have passed away . "

66021006	And He said to me , " I am the Alpha and the Omega , the Beginning and the End . I will give from the spring of the water of life freely to him that is thirsty .

66021008	But the cowardly , and unbelieving , and sinners , and abominable , and murderers , and fornicators , and drug users , and idolaters , and all who are false shall have their part in the lake which burns with fire and brimstone , which is the second death . "
66021009	Then one of the seven angels who had the seven bowls being full with the seven last plagues came to me and spoke with me , saying , " Come , I will show you the wife , the bride of the Lamb . "
66021010	And he carried me away in [ the ] Spirit onto a great and high mountain , and he showed to me the holy city Jerusalem , coming down out of heaven from God ,
66021011	having the glory of God . Its radiance was like a most precious stone , like a jasper stone , [ clear as ] crystal ,
66021012	having a wall great and high , having twelve gates , and at the gates twelve angels , and names written on them , which are the names of the twelve tribes of the sons of Israel :
66021013	three gates on the east , three gates on the north , three gates on the south , and three gates on the west .
66021014	And the wall of the city had twelve foundations , and on them were the twelve names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb .
66021015	And he who spoke with me had a measure , a golden reed , so that he might measure the city , and its gates .
66021016	The city is laid out [ like ] a square ; its length is as great as its breadth . And he measured the city with the reed : twelve thousand furlongs . Its length , breadth , and height are equal .
66021017	And its wall is one hundred and forty-four cubits , [ by the ] measure of a man , which is , of an angel .
66021018	And the construction of its wall was of jasper ; and the city was pure gold , like transparent glass .

66021020	the fifth sardonyx , the sixth carnelian , the seventh chrysolite , the eighth beryl , the ninth topaz , the tenth chrysoprase , the eleventh jacinth , and the twelfth amethyst .
66021021	The twelve gates are twelve pearls : each one of the gates was [ made ] of one pearl . And the street of the city was pure gold , like transparent glass .
66021022	But I saw no temple in it , for the Lord God Almighty is its temple , also the Lamb .
66021023	The city had no need of the sun nor of the moon to shine , for the very glory of God illuminated it , and its lamp is the Lamb .
66021024	And the nations shall walk in its light , and the kings of the earth shall bring to it [ the ] glory and honor of the nations into it .
66021025	And its gates shall by no means be closed by day , for night shall not exist there .
66021026	And they shall bring the glory and the honor of the nations into it , so that they may enter .
66021027	But there shall by no means enter into it any common [ thing ] , and the [ one ] doing an abomination and a lie , but only those who are written in the Lamb's Book of Life .
